Upāyo ca upāyabhāveneva attano phalassa patiṭṭhā hotīti āha ^b^‘‘patiṭṭhānaṭṭheneva pādo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Chandoyeva…pe… vīmaṃsāva vīmaṃsiddhipādoti kathitaṃ,^eb^ tasmā na cattāro khandhā iddhiyā samānakālikā nānākkhaṇikā vā iddhipādā, jeṭṭhakabhūtā pana chandādayo eva sabbattha iddhipādāti ayameva tesaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ adhippāyo. Suttantabhājanīye hi abhidhammabhājanīye ca samādhivisesanavasena dassitānaṃ upāyabhūtānaṃ iddhipādānaṃ pākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ uttaracūḷabhājanīyaṃ vuttanti. ^b^Kecī^eb^ti uttaravihāravāsitherā kira.
[06]Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^444^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhidhammabhājanīye ‘‘iddhipādoti tathābhūtassa phasso…pe… paggāho avikkhepo’’ti (vibha. 447) iddhīddhipādatthadassanatthaṃ paggāhāvikkhepā vuttā, cittapaññā ca saṅkhipitvāti. ^b^Cattāri nayasahassāni vibhattānī^eb^ti idaṃ sādhipativārānaṃ paripuṇṇānaṃ abhāvā vicāretabbaṃ. Na hi adhipatīnaṃ adhipatayo vijjanti, ekekasmiṃ pana iddhipādaniddese ekeko adhipativāro labbhatīti soḷasa soḷasa nayasatāni labbhanti.
[06]Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]Nanu ^a^V0.0169^ea^ ca cattāropi adhipatayo ekakkhaṇe labbhanti, aññamaññassa pana adhipatayo na bhavanti ‘‘cattāro iddhipādā na maggādhipatino’’ti vuttattā. Rājaputtopamāpi hi etamatthaṃ dīpetīti? Na, ekakkhaṇe dutiyassa adhipatino abhāvato eva, ‘‘na maggādhipatino’’ti vuttattā rājaputtopamā adhipatiṃ na karontīti imamevatthaṃ dīpeti, na adhipatīnaṃ sahabhāvaṃ. Taṃ kathaṃ jānitabbanti? Paṭikkhittattā. Adhipatipaccayaniddese ^a^M0.0170^ea^ hi ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (paṭṭhā. aṭṭha. 1.3) vuttā ‘‘kasmā pana yathā hetupaccayaniddese ‘hetū hetusampayuttakāna’nti vuttaṃ, evamidha ‘adhipatī adhipatisampayuttakāna’nti avatvā ‘chandādhipati chandasampayuttakāna’ntiādinā nayena desanā katāti? Ekakkhaṇe abhāvato’’ti. Sati ca catunnaṃ adhipatīnaṃ sahabhāve ‘‘ariyamaggasamaṅgissa vīmaṃsādhipateyyaṃ maggaṃ bhāventassā’’ti visesanaṃ na kattabbaṃ siyā avīmaṃsādhipatikassa maggassa abhāvā. Chandādīnaṃ aññamaññādhipatikaraṇabhāve ca ‘‘vīmaṃsaṃ ṭhapetvā taṃsampayutto’’tiādinā chandādīnaṃ vīmaṃsādhipatikattavacanaṃ na vattabbaṃ siyā. Tathā ‘‘cattāro ariyamaggā siyā maggādhipatino, siyā na vattabbā maggādhipatino’’ti (dha. sa. 1429) evamādīhipi adhipatīnaṃ sahabhāvo paṭikkhitto evāti.
[06]Pañhapucchakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Iddhipādavibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^466^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Patiṭṭhānāyūhanā^eb^^a^M0.0171^ea^^a^V0.0170^ea^ oghataraṇasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ (saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.1) –

[08]‘‘Kilesavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, abhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanā. Tathā taṇhādiṭṭhīhi patiṭṭhānaṃ, avasesakilesābhisaṅkhārehi āyūhanā. Taṇhāvasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, diṭṭhivasena āyūhanā. Sassatadiṭṭhiyā patiṭṭhānaṃ, ucchedadiṭṭhiyā āyūhanā. Līnavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, uddhaccavasena āyūhanā. Kāmasukhānuyogavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, attakilamathānuyogavasena āyūhanā. Sabbākusalābhisaṅkhāravasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, sabbalokiyakusalābhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanā’’ti –
[07]Vuttesu pakāresu idha avuttānaṃ vasena veditabbā.

[03]Sammappavatte dhamme paṭisañcikkhati, upapattito ikkhati, tadākāro hutvā pavattatīti ^b^paṭisaṅkhānalakkhaṇo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo^eb^. Evañca katvā ‘‘paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā gahaṇe majjhattatā’’ti upekkhākiccādhimattatāya saṅkhārupekkhā vuttā. Anukkamanikkhepe payojanaṃ purimassa purimassa pacchimapacchimakāraṇabhāvo.

[03]^b^467^eb^^b^.^eb^ Balavatī ^a^V0.0171^ea^ eva sati satisambojjhaṅgoti katvā balavabhāvadīpanatthaṃ paññā gahitā, na yassa kassaci sampadhāraṇasati, kusaluppattikāraṇassa pana saraṇaṃ satīti dassento ^b^‘‘vattaṃ vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Vattasīse ṭhatvā^eb^ti ‘‘aho vata me dhammaṃ suṇeyyuṃ, sutvā ca dhammaṃ pasīdeyyuṃ, pasannā ca me pasannākāraṃ kareyyu’’nti evaṃcitto ahutvā ‘‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo…pe… viññūhi, aho vata me dhammaṃ suṇeyyuṃ, sutvā ca dhammaṃ ājāneyyuṃ, ājānitvā ca pana tathatthāya paṭipajjeyyu’’nti dhammasudhammataṃ paṭicca kāruññaṃ anuddayaṃ anukampaṃ upādāya mahākassapattherena viya bhāsitanti attho. ^b^Vimuttāyatanasīse^eb^ti ‘‘na heva kho ^a^M0.0172^ea^ satthā, apica kho yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena paresaṃ desessāmī’’ti evaṃ vimuttikāraṇapadhānabhāve ṭhatvā. Cirakatavattādivasena taṃsamuṭṭhāpako arūpakoṭṭhāso vutto, bhāvatthattā eva vā katabhāsita-saddā kiriyābhūtassa arūpakoṭṭhāsassa vācakāti katvā āha ^b^‘‘kāyaviññattiṃ…pe… koṭṭhāsa’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpakatā^eb^ purimānaṃ channaṃ attano attano anantarikassa, paresaṃ sabbesaṃ vā taṃtaṃpariyāyena samuṭṭhāpanavasena yojetabbā. ^b^Kāmalokavaṭṭāmisā^eb^ti taṇhā tadārammaṇā khandhāti vadanti, pañcakāmaguṇiko ca rāgo tadārammaṇañca ^b^kāmāmisaṃ,^eb^ ‘‘sassato attā ca loko cā’’tiādinā lokaggahaṇavasena pavatto sassatucchedasahagato rāgo tadārammaṇañca ^b^lokāmisaṃ,^eb^ lokadhammā vā, vaṭṭassādavasena uppanno saṃsārajanako rāgo tadārammaṇañca ^b^vaṭṭāmisaṃ^eb^. Maggassa pubbabhāgattā ^b^pubbabhāgā^eb^.
[06]Paṭhamanayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^468-469^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhiññeyyā dhammā^eb^ nāma ‘‘sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā, dve dhātuyo, tisso dhātuyo, cattāri ariyasaccāni, pañca vimuttāyatanāni, cha anuttariyāni, satta niddasavatthūni, aṭṭhābhibhāyatanāni, navānupubbavihārā, dasa nijjaravatthūnī’’ti evaṃpabhedā dhammā ^a^V0.0172^ea^, ‘‘sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññeyya’’nti (saṃ. ni. 4.46) dassitā khandhādayo ca. ^b^Vāna^eb^nti vinandhanaṃ bhavādīnaṃ, gamanaṃ vā piyarūpasātarūpesu.

[03]^b^Caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa uppannavīriyaṃ^eb^ vipassanāsahagatanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Ettakenā^eb^ti ‘‘lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā’’ti ettāvatā. ^b^Lokiyanti vadanto na kilamatī^eb^ti kāyaviññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa lokiyattā acodanīyoti attho. ^b^Alabbha…pe… paṭikkhittā^eb^ti rūpāvacare alabbhamānakaṃ pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ upādāya labbhamānāpi avitakkāvicārā pīti paṭikkhittā, ‘‘pītisambojjhaṅgo’’ti na vuttoti attho. Kāmāvacare ^a^M0.0173^ea^ vā alabbhamānakaṃ avitakkāvicāraṃ pītiṃ upādāya labbhamānakāva pītibojjhaṅgabhūtā paṭikkhittā, avitakkāvicāro pītisambojjhaṅgo na vuttoti attho.

[03]^b^Ajjhattavimokkha^eb^nti ajjhattadhamme abhinivisitvā tato vuṭṭhitamaggo ‘‘ajjhattavimokkho’’ti idha vuttoti adhippāyo. ^b^Na vāretabbo^eb^ti vipassanāpādakesu kasiṇādijhānesu satiādīnaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyattā na paṭikkhipitabboti attho. Anuddharantā pana vipassanā viya bodhiyā maggassa āsannakāraṇaṃ jhānaṃ na hoti, na ca tathā ekantikaṃ kāraṇaṃ, na ca vipassanākiccassa viya jhānakiccassa niṭṭhānaṃ maggoti katvā na uddharanti. Tattha kasiṇajjhānaggahaṇena tadāyattāni āruppānipi gahitānīti daṭṭhabbāni. Asubhajjhānānaṃ avacanaṃ avitakkāvicārassa adhippetattā.
[06]Dutiyanayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^470-471^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tadaṅgasamucchedanissaraṇavivekanissitataṃ vatvā paṭippassaddhivivekanissitattassa avacanaṃ ‘‘satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetī’’tiādinā (saṃ. ni. 5.182; vibha. 471) idha bhāvetabbānaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ vuttattā. Bhāvitabojjhaṅgassa hi sacchikātabbā phalabojjhaṅgā ^a^V0.0173^ea^ abhidhammabhājanīye vuttāti. Vossagga-saddo pariccāgattho pakkhandanattho cāti vossaggassa duvidhatā vuttā. ^b^Yathāvuttenā^eb^ti tadaṅgasamucchedappakārena tanninnabhāvārammaṇakaraṇappakārena ca. ^b^Pariṇāmentaṃ^eb^ vipassanākkhaṇe, ^b^pariṇataṃ^eb^ maggakkhaṇe.
[06]Tatiyanayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^472^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Upekkhanavasenā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0174^ea^ sabhāvaniddesataṃ dasseti, hāpanavaḍḍhanesu byāpāraṃ akatvā upapattito ikkhanavasenāti attho. ^b^Lokiyaupekkhanāya adhikā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā^eb^ti ayamattho idha lokuttarā eva adhippetāti yuttoti.
[06]Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Bojjhaṅgavibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^490^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhidhamme ^a^M0.0175^ea^^a^V0.0174^ea^ lokuttaracittabhājanīyepi ‘‘tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti…pe… aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hotī’’ti (dha. sa. 337) vuttattā idhāpi abhidhammabhājanīye abhidhammānurūpaṃ desanaṃ karonto ‘‘aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo’’ti ariyopapadataṃ na karoti.

[03]^b^493^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tasmiṃ samaye^eb^ti lokiyakālena etesaṃ atirekakiccaṃ dasseti. Viratiuppādanena micchāvācādīni puggalaṃ pajahāpentīti sammādiṭṭhādīni pañca ^b^‘‘kārāpakaṅgānī’’^eb^ti vuttāni. Sammāvācādikiriyā hi virati, tañca etāni kārāpentīti. ^b^Virativasenā^eb^ti viramaṇakiriyāvasena, na kārāpakabhāvena kattubhāvena cāti attho. ^b^Imaṃ…pe… kiccātirekataṃ dassetu^eb^nti lokuttarakkhaṇepi imāneva pañca sammāvācādittayassa ekakkhaṇe kārāpakānīti dassetunti attho. Micchādiṭṭhādikā dasa, tappaccayā akusalā ca dasāti vīsati akusalapakkhiyā, sammādiṭṭhādikā dasa, tappaccayā ca kusalā dasāti vīsati kusalapakkhiyā ca mahācattārīsakasutte (ma. ni. 3.136) vuttāti tassa etaṃ nāmaṃ.
[03]^b^Puññabhāgiyā^eb^ti puññakoṭṭhāse bhavā, puññābhisaṅkhārekadesabhūtāti attho. Khandhopadhiṃ vipaccati, tattha vā vipaccatīti ^b^upadhivepakkā^eb^.

[03]Pañcaṅgikamaggaṃ uddisitvā tattha ekekaṃ pucchitvā tassa tasseva samayavavatthānaṃ katvā vissajjanaṃ ^a^V0.0175^ea^^b^‘‘pāṭiyekkaṃ pucchitvā pāṭiyekkaṃ vissajjana’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Saha pana pucchitvā pañcannampi samayavavatthānaṃ katvā vissajjane ‘‘tattha katamā sammādiṭṭhiyā paññā’’tiādiko paṭiniddeso ekato vissajjanapaṭiniddesattā na pāṭiyekkaṃ pucchāvissajjanaṃ nāma hotīti. Tattha pañcaṅgikavāre eva pāṭiyekkaṃ pucchāvissajjanaṃ sammādiṭṭhādīsu kārāpakaṅgesu ekekamukhāya bhāvanāya magguppattiṃ sandhāya katanti veditabbaṃ. Vācādīni hi pubbasuddhiyā sijjhanti, na maggassa upacārenāti.
[06]Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Maggaṅgavibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^508^eb^^b^.^eb^ Jhānassa ^a^M0.0176^ea^^a^V0.0176^ea^^b^pubbabhāgakaraṇīyasampadā^eb^ pātimokkhasaṃvarādi. Asubhānussatiyo lokuttarajjhānāni ca ito bahiddhā natthīti ^b^sabbappakāra^eb^-ggahaṇaṃ karoti, ^b^suññā parappavādā samaṇebhī^eb^ti (ma. ni. 1.139; a. ni. 4.241) vacanena samaṇabhāvakarapubbabhāgakaraṇīyasampadāsampannassapi abhāvaṃ dasseti. Sikkhāpadesu nāmakāyādivasena vuttesu vacanānatikkamavasena sikkhitabbesu, avītikkamanaviraticetanāsaṅkhātesu vā sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu paripūraṇavasena sikkhitabbesu sā sā bhikkhusikkhādikā sikkhāpadekadesabhūtā sikkhitabbāti āha ^b^‘‘sikkhāpadesūti idamassa sikkhitabbadhammaparidīpana’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Santosādi^eb^vasena itarītarasantosaṃ, tassa ca vaṇṇavāditaṃ, aladdhā ca aparitassanaṃ, laddhā ca agadhitaparibhoganti ete guṇe dasseti. Jhānabhāvanāya kārakoti paridīpanaṃ ^b^kārakabhāvaparidīpanaṃ^eb^. ^b^Arañña^eb^ntiādinā senāsanassa pabhedaṃ, ^b^appasadda^eb^ntiādinā nirādīnavataṃ, ^b^paṭisallānasāruppa^eb^nti ānisaṃsaṃ dīpetīti āha ^b^‘‘senāsanappabhede…pe… paridīpana’’^eb^nti.
[06]Mātikāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^509^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kammatthehi ^a^V0.0177^ea^ diṭṭhi-saddādīhi sāsanaṃ vuttanti ^b^‘‘diṭṭhattā diṭṭhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabhāvaṭṭhenā^eb^ti aviparītaṭṭhena. Sikkhiyamāno kāyādīni vineti, na aññathāti āha ^b^‘‘sikkhitabbaṭṭhena vinayo’’^eb^ti, vinayo vā sikkhitabbāni ^a^M0.0177^ea^ sikkhāpadāni, khandhattayaṃ sikkhitabbanti vinayo viyāti vinayoti dasseti. Satthu anusāsanadānabhūtaṃ sikkhattayanti āha ^b^‘‘anusiṭṭhidānavasenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Sammādiṭṭhipaccayattā^eb^ti sammādiṭṭhiyā paccayattā. Tisso hi sikkhā sikkhantassa sammādiṭṭhi paripūratīti. ‘‘Tasmātiha tvaṃ bhikkhu ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu, ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ? Sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ diṭṭhi ca ujukā’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.369) vacanato sammādiṭṭhipubbaṅgamaṃ sikkhattayaṃ. Etasmiñca atthadvaye phalakāraṇopacārehi sikkhattayaṃ ‘‘diṭṭhī’’ti vuttaṃ, kusaladhammehi vā attano ekadesabhūtehīti adhippāyo. Bhagavato vinayanakiriyattā vinayo sikkhattayaṃ, taṃ pana vinayanaṃ dhammeneva avisamasabhāvena, desanādhammena vā pavattaṃ, na daṇḍādināti ^b^‘‘dhammavinayo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Anavajjadhammattha^eb^nti paramānavajjanibbānatthaṃ, akuppacetovimuttiatthaṃ vā. Dhammesu abhiññeyyādīsu abhijānanādikāraṇaṃ sikkhattayanti taṃ ^b^‘‘dhammavinayo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Imissā imasmi’’nti punappunaṃ vuccamānaṃ niyamakaraṇaṃ hoti, ^b^eva^eb^-saddalopo vā katoti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘niyamo kato’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^510^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhikkhuko^eb^ti anaññatthena ^b^ka^eb^-kārena padaṃ vaḍḍhitanti ^b^‘‘bhikkhanadhammatāyā’’^eb^ti atthamāha. ^b^Bhikkhako^eb^ti pana pāṭhe bhikkhatīti bhikkhakoti attho. ^b^Jallikaṃ^eb^ rajamissaṃ malaṃ, amissaṃ ^b^malameva. Bhinnapaṭadharo^eb^ti nibbacanaṃ bhinnapaṭadhare bhikkhu-saddassa niruḷhattā vuttaṃ.

[03]Yassa bhāvetabbo pahātabbo ca odhi avasiṭṭho atthi, so odhiso, arahā pana tadabhāvā odhirahitoti ^b^‘‘anodhiso kilesānaṃ pahānā bhikkhū’’^eb^ti vutto. Odhi-saddo vā ekadese ^a^V0.0178^ea^ niruḷhoti sabbamaggā sabbakilesā ca arahatā bhāvitā pahīnā ca ‘‘odhī’’ti na vuccanti. ^b^Pahānā^eb^ti idañca nibbacanaṃ bhedanapariyāyavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Sekkho^eb^tiādinā ^a^M0.0178^ea^ bhikkhu-saddena vuccamānaṃ atthaṃ guṇavasena dasseti, heṭṭhā pana ‘‘samaññāya paṭiññāyā’’ti paññāyanavasena, ‘‘bhikkhatī’’tiādinā nibbacanavasena dassito.

[03]^b^Sekkho bhikkhūti satta sekkhā kathitā, bhinnattā pāpakānaṃ…pe… bhikkhūti khīṇāsavova kathito^eb^ti idaṃ dvayaṃ ‘‘sekkhoti puthujjanakalyāṇakena saddhiṃ satta ariyā, bhinnattāti iminā pana cattāro phalaṭṭhā’’ti iminā dvayena na sameti, tadidaṃ nippariyāyadassanaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^‘‘Sesaṭṭhānesu puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo kathitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, nanu paṭiññāya bhikkhusīlopi vuttoti? Vutto, na pana idhādhippeto sabbappakārajjhānanibbattakassa adhippetattā.
[03]Bhagavato vacanaṃ upasampadākammakaraṇassa kāraṇattā ṭhānaṃ, tadanurūpaṃ ^b^ṭhānārahaṃ,^eb^ anūnañattianussāvanaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā ca avuttanti attho.

[03]^b^511^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nippariyāyato sīlaṃ^eb^ samādānaviratiavītikkamanaviratibhāvatoti adhippāyo. Anabhijjhādīni sandhāya cetasikasīlassa pariyāyasīlatā vuttā. ^b^Nagaravaḍḍhakī^eb^ vatthuvijjācariyoti vadanti. ^b^Catubbidho āhāro^eb^ asitādīni, bhakkhitabbabhuñjitabbalehitabbacubitabbāni vā.

[03]^b^Pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto^eb^ pihitindriyo hoti tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ indriyasaṃvarāhārattā, pātimokkhasaṃvaro vā indriyasaṃvarassa upanissayo hoti. Iti pātimokkhasaṃvarena pihitindriyo ‘‘pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto’’ti vutto. Iminā adhippāyena ‘‘saṃvuto’’ti etassa pihitindriyoti atthamāha. ^b^Pātimokkhena ca saṃvarena cā^eb^ti idaṃ pātimokkhato aññaṃ sīlaṃ kāyikāvītikkamādiggahaṇena gahitanti iminā adhippāyena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dutiyo panattho dvinnampi ekatthataṃ sandhāya vutto.

[03]^b^513^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabbampi^eb^^a^V0.0179^ea^^b^dussīlya^eb^nti iminā abhijjhādayo ca gahitāti sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘manasāpi ācarati eva, tasmā taṃ dassetu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti kāyikavītikkamādivasena vuttesu anācāresu. ^b^Garubhaṇḍavissajjanamāpajjatī^eb^ti thullaccayaṃ āpajjatīti attho.

[03]^b^Aropimo^eb^ti ^a^M0.0179^ea^ saṅghikabhūmiyaṃ uṭṭhito vutto. ^b^Phātikamma^eb^nti garubhaṇḍantarabhūtaṃ kammaṃ. ^b^Daṇḍakamma^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ hatthakammamāha. Sināyanti etenāti ^b^sinānaṃ,^eb^ cuṇṇādi.

[03]Saccālīkena piyavādī ‘‘cāṭū’’ti vuccati, cāṭuṃ attānaṃ icchatīti cāṭukāmo, tassa bhāvo ^b^cāṭukamyatā. Muggasūpassa appavisanaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi^eb^ sabbāhārehi aviruddhattāti adhippāyo. Paribhaṭati dhāreti, poseti vāti ^b^paribhaṭo,^eb^ atha vā parivārabhūto bhaṭo sevako ^b^paribhaṭo^eb^.

[03]^b^Bhaṇḍāgārikakammaṃ^eb^ gihīnaṃ kariyamānaṃ vuttaṃ. Piṇḍatthaṃ paṭipiṇḍadānaṃ, piṇḍaṃ datvā paṭipiṇḍaggahaṇaṃ vā ^b^piṇḍapaṭipiṇḍaṃ^eb^. Saṅghabhogacetiyabhogānaṃ ayoniso vicāraṇaṃ ^b^saṅghuppādacetiyuppādapaṭṭhapanaṃ,^eb^ attano santake viya paṭipajjananti keci.

[03]^b^514^eb^^b^.^eb^ Gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gocaro viyāti ^b^gocaro,^eb^ abhiṇhaṃ caritabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Gāvo vā cakkhādīni indriyāni, tehi caritabbaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^gocaro^eb^. Ayutto gocaro ^b^agocaro^eb^ti tadañño yutto ‘‘gocaro’’ti vutto.
[03]^b^Vā^eb^-saddo vidhunanatthopi hotīti katvā āha ^b^‘‘viniddhutakibbisāni vā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^515^eb^^b^.^eb^ Avarā pacchimā mattā etesanti ^b^oramattakāni. Saṃyamakaraṇīyānī^eb^ti kāyavācāsaṃyamamattena kattabbapaṭikammāni, vikkhipitabbāni vā. ‘‘Puna na evaṃ karomī’’ti cittena saṃvaramattena, indriyasaṃvareneva vā karaṇīyāni ^b^saṃvarakaraṇīyāni^eb^. Divivihārajanapadavāsī ^b^divivihāravāsī^eb^. Manassa adhiṭṭhānameva ^b^adhiṭṭhānāvikammaṃ^eb^. Desanā idha ^b^‘‘vuṭṭhānāvikamma’’^eb^nti adhippetā. Tattha ‘‘cittuppādakaraṇīyāni manasikārapaṭibaddhānī’’ti vacanato pātimokkhasaṃvaravisuddhatthaṃ ^a^V0.0180^ea^ anatikkamanīyāni anāpattigamanīyāni vajjāni vuttānīti ācariyassa adhippāyo. ^b^Catubbidhassā^eb^ti attānuvādaparānuvādadaṇḍaduggatibhayassa.

[03]^b^516^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Idha bhikkhū’’ti bhikkhu eva adhippetoti sandhāya ^b^‘‘sesasikkhā pana atthuddhāravasena sikkhā-saddassa atthadassanatthaṃ vuttā’’^eb^ti āha. Bhikkhuggahaṇaṃ ^a^M0.0180^ea^ pana aggaparisāmukhena sabbajjhānanibbattakānaṃ catunnampi parisānaṃ dassanatthaṃ kataṃ. Guṇato vā bhikkhu adhippetoti sabbāpi sikkhā idhādhippetāti daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Sabbena sikkhāsamādānenā^eb^ti ettha yena samādānena sabbāpi sikkhā samādinnā honti, taṃ ekampi sabbasamādānakiccakarattā sabbasamādānaṃ nāma hoti, anekesu pana vattabbameva natthi. ^b^Sabbena sikkhitabbākārenā^eb^ti avītikkamadesanāvuṭṭhānavattacaraṇādiākārena. Vītikkamanavasena sesassapi nissesatākaraṇaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘bhinnassapī’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^519^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āvaraṇīyehi cittaparisodhanabhāvanā jāgariyānuyogoti katvā āha ^b^‘‘bhāvana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Suppapariggāhaka^eb^nti ‘‘suppapariggāhakaṃ nāma idaṃ ito pubbe ito parañca natthi, ayametassa paccayo’’tiādinā pariggāhakaṃ.
[03]^b^520-521^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yutto^eb^ti ārambhamāno. Sātaccaṃ nepakkañca pavattayamāno jāgariyānuyogaṃ anuyutto hotīti sambandhaṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^522^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Lokiyāyapi…pe… āhā^eb^ti idaṃ vipassanābhāvanāya satipaṭṭhānādayo ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe saha nappavattanti, pavattamānānipi indriyabalāni bojjhaṅgesveva antogadhāni honti. Pītisambojjhaṅgaggahaṇena hi tadupanissayabhūtaṃ saddhindriyaṃ saddhābalañca gahitameva hoti ‘‘saddhūpanisaṃ pāmojja’’nti (saṃ. ni. 2.23) vuttattā. Maggaṅgāni pañceva vipassanākkhaṇe pavattantīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^523^eb^^b^.^eb^ Samantato, sammā, samaṃ vā sātthakādipajānanaṃ sampajānaṃ, tadeva ^b^sampajaññaṃ. Tenā^eb^ti satisampayuttattā eva uddese avuttāpi sati niddese ‘‘sato’’ti iminā vuttāti adhippāyo.

[03]Sātthakānaṃ ^a^V0.0181^ea^ abhikkamādīnaṃ sampajānanaṃ ^b^sātthakasampajaññaṃ. Evaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ^eb^. Abhikkamādīsu pana bhikkhācāragocare aññatthāpi ca pavattesu avijahite kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocare sampajaññaṃ ^b^gocarasampajaññaṃ^eb^. Abhikkamādīsu asammuyhanameva sampajaññaṃ ^b^asammohasampajaññaṃ^eb^.
[03]^b^Dve^eb^^a^M0.0181^ea^^b^kathā^eb^ti vacanakaraṇākaraṇakathā na kathitapubbā. Vacanaṃ karomi eva, tasmā subbacattā paṭivacanaṃ demīti attho.

[03]^b^Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānaggeneva, kammaṭṭhānaṃ padhānaṃ katvā evāti attho. Tena ‘‘pattampi acetana’’ntiādinā vakkhamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ, yathāparihariyamānaṃ vā avijahitvāti dasseti. ‘‘Tasmā’’ti etassa ‘‘dhammakathā kathetabbāyevāti vadantī’’ti etena sambandho. ^b^Bhaye^eb^ti paracakkādibhaye.
[03]^b^Avasesaṭṭhāne^eb^ti yāguaggahitaṭṭhāne. ^b^Ṭhānacaṅkamanamevā^eb^ti adhiṭṭhātabbiriyāpathavasena vuttaṃ, na bhojanādikāle avassaṃ kattabbanisajjāyapi paṭikkhepavasena.
[03]^b^Thero dārucīriyo^eb^ –

[08]‘‘Tasmātiha te, bāhiya, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ. Diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute mute viññāte. Yato kho te, bāhiya, diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute mute viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissati, tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tena, yato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tena. Tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tattha, yato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tattha. Tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena. Esevanto dukkhassā’’ti (udā. 10) –
[07]Ettakena arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.

[03]Khāṇuādipariharaṇatthaṃ, patiṭṭhitapādapariharaṇatthaṃ vā passena haraṇaṃ ^b^vītiharaṇa^eb^nti vadanti. Yāva ^a^V0.0182^ea^ patiṭṭhitapādo, tāva āharaṇaṃ ^b^atiharaṇaṃ,^eb^ tato paraṃ haraṇaṃ ^b^vītiharaṇa^eb^nti ayaṃ vā etesaṃ viseso. ^b^Avīci^eb^nti nirantaraṃ.

[03]^b^Paṭhamajavanepi…pe… na hotī^eb^ti idaṃ pañcaviññāṇavīthiyaṃ itthipurisoti rajjanādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ ayoniso āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanavasena iṭṭhe itthirūpādimhi lobho, aniṭṭhe ca paṭigho uppajjati. Manodvāre pana itthipurisoti rajjanādi hoti, tassa ^a^M0.0182^ea^ pañcadvārajavanaṃ mūlaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ vā sabbaṃ bhavaṅgādi. Evaṃ manodvārajavanassa mūlavasena ^b^mūlapariññā^eb^ vuttā. ^b^Āgantukatāvakālikatā^eb^ pana pañcadvārajavanasseva apubbatittaratāvasena. ^b^Maṇisappo^eb^ sīhaḷadīpe vijjamānā ekā sappajātīti vadanti. ^b^Calana^eb^nti kampanaṃ.

[03]^b^Atiharatī^eb^ti yāva mukhā āharati. ^b^Vītiharatī^eb^ti tato yāva kucchi, tāva harati, kucchigataṃ vā passato harati. ^b^Allattañca anupāletī^eb^ti vāyuādīhi ativisosanaṃ yathā na hoti, tathā pāleti. ^b^Ābhujatī^eb^ti pariyesanajjhoharaṇajiṇṇājiṇṇatādiṃ āvajjeti, vijānātīti attho. Taṃtaṃvijānananipphādakoyeva hi payogo ^b^‘‘sammāpayogo’’^eb^ti vuttoti. Atha vā ‘‘sammāpaṭipattimāgamma abbhantare attā nāma koci bhujanako natthī’’tiādinā vijānanaṃ ^b^ābhujanaṃ^eb^.
[03]^b^Aṭṭhāne^eb^ti manussāmanussapariggahite ayutte ṭhāne khettadevāyatanādike. ^b^Tumbato^eb^ veḷunāḷiādiudakabhājanato. ^b^Ta^eb^nti chaḍḍitaṃ udakaṃ.
[03]^b^Gateti gamane^eb^ti pubbe abhikkamapaṭikkamaggahaṇena gamanepi purato pacchato ca kāyassa atiharaṇaṃ vuttanti idha gamanameva gahitanti veditabbaṃ, vakkhamāno vā etesaṃ viseso.

[03]^b^Ettakenā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvā catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ pavattanavacanamattena gocarasampajaññaṃ na pākaṭaṃ hotīti attho. ^b^Evaṃ pana sutte kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ hotī^eb^ti caṅkamanaṭṭhānanisajjāsu eva pavatte pariggaṇhantassa sutte pavattā apākaṭā hontīti attho.
[03]Kāyādikiriyāmayattā ^a^V0.0183^ea^ āvajjanakiriyāsamuṭṭhitattā ca javanaṃ, sabbampi vā chadvārappavattaṃ ^b^kiriyāmayapavattaṃ^eb^ nāma, dutiyajjhānaṃ vacīsaṅkhāravirahā ‘‘tuṇhībhāvo’’ti vuccati.

[03]^b^526^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Upāsanaṭṭhāna^eb^nti issāsānaṃ viya upāsanassa sikkhāyogakaraṇassa kammaṭṭhānaupāsanassa ṭhānanti attho. Tameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yogapatha’’^eb^nti āhāti. ^b^Sīsaṃ dhovatī^eb^ti icchādāsabyā bhujissataṃ ñāpayati, micchāpaṭipannehi vā pakkhittaṃ ayasarajaṃ dhovati.

[03]^b^529^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vinayapariyāyena^eb^^a^M0.0183^ea^ adinnādānapārājike āgataṃ. ^b^Suttantapariyāyena^eb^ āraññakasikkhāpade ‘‘pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima’’nti āgataṃ āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya. Na hi so vinayapariyāyike araññe vasanato ‘‘āraññako pantasenāsano’’ti sutte vuttoti.
[03]^b^530^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Nitumba’’ntipi ‘‘nadīkuñja’’ntipi yaṃ vadanti,^eb^ taṃ kandaranti apabbatapadesepi vidugganadīnivattanapadesaṃ ^b^kandara^eb^nti dasseti.
[03]^b^531^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhājetvā dassita^eb^nti etena bhājetabbataṃ ante niddesassa kāraṇaṃ dasseti.
[03]^b^533^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rahassa kiriyā rahassaṃ, taṃ arahati tassa yogganti ^b^rāhasseyyakaṃ^eb^. Vicittā hi taddhitāti. Rahasi vā sādhu rahassaṃ, tassa yoggaṃ ^b^rāhasseyyakaṃ^eb^.
[03]^b^536^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṇihito^eb^ti suṭṭhu ṭhapito.

[03]^b^537^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pariggahitaniyyāna^eb^nti pariggahitaniyyānasabhāvaṃ, kāyādīsu suṭṭhu pavattiyā niyyānasabhāvayuttanti attho. Kāyādipariggahaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ vā pariggaho, taṃ-sampayuttatāya pariggahitaṃ niyyānabhūtaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ katvāti attho.

[03]^b^542-543^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vikārappattiyā^eb^ti cittassa vikārāpattibhāvenāti attho. ^b^Sabbasaṅgāhikavasenā^eb^ti sattasaṅkhāragatasabbakodhasaṅgāhikavasena. Sabbasaṅgahaṇañca samucchedappahānassapi adhippetattā katanti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^546^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Idaṃ^eb^^a^V0.0184^ea^^b^sandhāyā^eb^ti ‘‘dve dhammā’’ti sandhāya. Ekavacanena ‘‘thinamiddha’’nti uddisitvāpi niddese ‘‘santā’’ti ^b^vacanabhedo,^eb^ bahuvacanaṃ katanti attho. ^b^Nirodhasantatāyā^eb^ti vacanaṃ aṅgasantatāya, sabhāvasantatāya vā santatānivāraṇatthaṃ.
[03]^b^550^eb^^b^.^eb^ Thinamiddhavikāravirahā tappaṭipakkhasaññā ^b^ālokasaññā^eb^ nāma hoti. Teneva vuttaṃ ‘‘ayaṃ saññā ālokā hotī’’ti.

[03]^b^553^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Vantattā muttattā’’tiādīni, ‘‘ālokā hotī’’tiādīni ca ^b^‘‘cattattātiādīnī’’^eb^ti vuttāni. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena vā dvinnampi niddesapadāni ^a^M0.0184^ea^ saṅgahetvā tattha yāni yesaṃ vevacanāni, tāneva sandhāya ^b^‘‘aññamaññavevacanānī’’^eb^ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Paṭimuñcato^eb^ti etena sārambhaṃ abhibhavaṃ dasseti. Nirāvaraṇā hutvā ābhujati sampajānātīti ^b^nirāvaraṇābhogā,^eb^ taṃsabhāvattā ^b^vivaṭā^eb^.
[03]^b^556^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Vikālo nu kho, na nu kho’’ti anicchayatāya katavatthujjhācāramūlako vippaṭisāro ^b^vatthujjhācāro^eb^ kāraṇavohārena vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
[03]^b^562^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kilissantī^eb^ti kilesentīti atthaṃ vadanti, sadarathabhāvena sayameva vā kilissanti. Na hi te uppajjamānā kilesarahitā uppajjantīti.
[03]^b^564^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Idheva^eb^ ca vibhaṅge ‘‘upeto hotī’’tiādi ^b^tattha tattha vuttameva^eb^.

[03]^b^588^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Niddesavasenā^eb^ti ‘‘tattha katamā upekkhā? Yā upekkhā’’tiādiniddesavasena. ‘‘Imāya upekkhāya upeto hotī’’tiādi ^b^paṭiniddesavasenā^eb^ti vadanti. ‘‘Tattha katamā…pe… imāya upekkhāya upeto hotī’’ti etena puggalo niddiṭṭho hoti, ‘‘samupeto’’tiādinā paṭiniddiṭṭho. Yāva vā ‘‘samannāgato’’ti padaṃ, tāva niddiṭṭho, ‘‘tena vuccati upekkhako’’ti iminā paṭiniddiṭṭhoti tesaṃ vasena niddesapaṭiniddesā yojetabbā. ^b^Pakārenā^eb^ti upekkhāya ‘‘upekkhanā’’tiādidhammappakārena ‘‘upeto samupeto’’tiādipuggalappakārena ca upekkhakasaddassa atthaṃ ṭhapento ^b^paṭṭhapenti^eb^. ‘‘Upekkhā’’ti etassa atthassa ‘‘upekkhanā’’ti ^b^kāraṇaṃ^eb^. Upekkhanāvasena ^a^V0.0185^ea^ hi upekkhāti. Tathā ‘‘upeto samupeto’’ti etesaṃ ‘‘upāgato samupāgato’’ti ^b^kāraṇa^eb^nti evaṃ dhammapuggalavasena ^b^tassa tassatthassa kāraṇaṃ dassentā vivaranti,^eb^ ‘‘upekkhako’’ti imasseva vā atthassa ‘‘imāya upekkhāya upeto hotī’’tiādinā ^b^kāraṇaṃ dassentā^eb^. ‘‘Upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā samupeto’’tiādinā byañjanānaṃ vibhāgaṃ ^b^dassentā vibhajanti^eb^. Upekkhaka-saddantogadhāya vā upekkhāya tasseva ca upekkhaka-saddassa visuṃ atthavacanaṃ ‘‘yā upekkhā upekkhanā’’tiādinā, ‘‘imāya upekkhāya upeto hotī’’tiādinā ca ^a^M0.0185^ea^^b^byañjanavibhāgo^eb^. Sabbathā aññātatā ^b^nikujjhitabhāvo,^eb^ kenaci pakārena viññātepi niravasesaparicchindanābhāvo ^b^gambhīrabhāvo^eb^.
[03]^b^602^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uparibhūmippattiyā^eb^ti idaṃ ‘‘rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā’’ti ettheva yojetabbaṃ. Viññāṇañcāyatanādīnipi vā ākāsānañcāyatanādīnaṃ uparibhūmiyoti sabbatthāpi na na yujjati.

[03]^b^610^eb^^b^.^eb^ Viññāṇañcāyatananiddese ‘‘anantaṃ viññāṇanti taṃyeva ākāsaṃ viññāṇena phuṭaṃ manasi karoti anantaṃ pharati, tena vuccati anantaṃ viññāṇa’’nti ettha ^b^viññāṇenā^eb^ti etaṃ upayogatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, taṃyeva ākāsaṃ phuṭaṃ viññāṇaṃ manasi karotīti kira aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ vā etassa attho – taṃyeva ākāsaṃ phuṭaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaviññāṇena manasi karotīti. Ayaṃ panattho yutto – taṃyeva ākāsaṃ viññāṇena phuṭaṃ tena gahitākāraṃ manasi karoti, evaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ anantaṃ pharatīti. Yañhi ākāsaṃ paṭhamāruppasamaṅgī viññāṇena anantaṃ pharati, taṃ pharaṇākārasahitameva viññāṇaṃ manasikaronto dutiyāruppasamaṅgī anantaṃ pharatīti vuccatīti.

[03]^b^615^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Taṃyeva viññāṇaṃ abhāvetī^eb^ti yaṃ pubbe ‘‘anantaṃ viññāṇa’’nti manasi kataṃ, taṃyevāti attho. Tasseva hi ārammaṇabhūtaṃ paṭhamena viya rūpanimittaṃ tatiyenāruppena abhāvetīti.
[06]Niddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^623^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhidhammabhājanīye ^a^V0.0186^ea^ pañcakanayadassane ‘‘pañca jhānānī’’ti ca, ‘‘tattha katamaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhāna’’nti ca ādinā uddhaṭaṃ. Uddhaṭānaṃyeva catunnaṃ paṭhamatatiyacatutthapañcamajjhānānaṃ dassanato, dutiyasseva visesadassanato ca.
[06]Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^640^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Lokuttarāpanetthā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0186^ea^ etesu tīsujhānesu ‘‘lokuttarā siyā appamāṇārammaṇā’’ti evaṃ koṭṭhāsikā pana maggakāle, phalakāle vā lokuttarabhūtā evāti adhippāyo. Paricchinnākāsakasiṇālokakasiṇānāpānabrahmavihāracatutthāni ^b^sabbatthapādakacatutthe^eb^ saṅgahitānīti daṭṭhabbāni.

[03]^b^Buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavā maggaṃ bhāvayiṃsu, phalaṃ sacchikariṃsū^eb^ti, ^b^bhāvessanti sacchikarissantī^eb^ti ca heṭṭhimamaggaphalānaṃ vasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Kusalato terasasu hi catutthesu ayaṃ kathā pavattā, na ca kusalacatutthena arahattamaggaphalāni daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti.

[03]‘‘Kiriyato terasanna’’nti ettha lokuttaracatutthaṃ kiriyaṃ natthīti ‘‘dvādasanna’’nti vattabbaṃ, kusalato vā terasasu sekkhaphalacatutthaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā ‘‘kiriyato terasanna’’nti asekkhacatutthena saha vadatīti veditabbaṃ. Sabbatthapādakañcettha khīṇāsavānaṃ yāni abhiññādīni santi, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ pādakattā ^b^sabbatthapādaka^eb^nti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi tesaṃ vaṭṭaṃ atthīti. Paricchannākāsakasiṇacatutthādīni viya vā navattabbatāya sabbatthapādakasamānattā ^b^sabbatthapādakatā^eb^ daṭṭhabbā.
[03]^b^Manosaṅkhārā^eb^^a^V0.0187^ea^ nāma saññāvedanā, cattāropi vā khandhā. ^b^Nimittaṃ ārabbhā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘nimittaṃ nibbānañcā’’ti vattabbaṃ.

[03]‘‘Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo’’ti (paṭṭhā. 2.20.28) ettha ‘‘ajjhattā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo’’ti vuttattā na cetopariyañāṇaṃ viya yathākammūpagañāṇaṃ parasantānagatameva jānāti, sasantānagatampi pana apākaṭaṃ rūpaṃ dibbacakkhu viya apākaṭaṃ kammaṃ vibhāveti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attano kammajānanakāle’’^eb^ti.
[06]Pañhapucchakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Jhānavibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^642^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabbadhī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0187^ea^^a^V0.0188^ea^ disādesodhinā anodhisopharaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, ^b^sabbattatāya sabbāvanta^eb^nti sattodhinā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anodhiso dassanattha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tathā-saddo iti-saddo vā na vutto^eb^ti ‘‘mettāsahagatena cetasā’’ti etassa anuvattakaṃ taṃ dvayaṃ tassa pharaṇantarādiṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhānanti katvā na vuttaṃ, puna ‘‘mettāsahagatena cetasā’’ti vuttanti attho.
[03]^b^643^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Hirottappānupālitā mettā na parihāyati^eb^ āsannasapattassa rāgassa sinehassa ca vipattiyā anuppattitoti adhippāyo.
[03]^b^645^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Adhimuñcitvā^eb^ti suṭṭhu pasāretvāti attho. Taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘adhikabhāvenā’’^eb^tiādimāha, balavatā vā adhimokkhena ^b^adhimuccitvā^eb^.

[03]^b^648^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Heṭṭhā vuttoyevā^eb^ti ‘‘sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabba’’nti etesaṃ ‘‘sabbena sikkhāsamādānena sabbaṃ sikkhaṃ, sabbena sikkhitabbākārena sabbaṃ sikkha’’nti ca ^b^jhānavibhaṅge^eb^ (vibha. aṭṭha. 516) attho vutto. Idha pana sabbena avadhinā attasamatāya sabbasattayuttatāya ca sabbaṃ lokaṃ, sabbāvadhidisādipharaṇākārehi sabbaṃ lokanti ca attho yujjati.
[03]^b^650^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paccatthikavighātavasenā^eb^ti mettādīnaṃ āsannadūrapaccatthikānaṃ rāgabyāpādādīnaṃ vighātavasena. ^b^Yaṃ appamāṇaṃ, so avero^eb^ti so averabhāvoti ayaṃ vā tassa atthoti.
[03]^b^653^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nirayādi ^a^V0.0189^ea^^b^gati,^eb^ caṇḍālādi ^b^kulaṃ,^eb^ annādīnaṃ alābhitā ^b^bhogo. Ādi^eb^-saddena dubbaṇṇatādi gahitaṃ.
[06]Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^699^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Imasmiṃ^eb^^a^M0.0188^ea^^b^pana…pe… kathitā^eb^ti iminā imasmiṃ vibhaṅge kathitānaṃ lokiyabhāvameva dassento khandhavibhaṅgādīhi visesetīti na aññattha lokuttarānaṃ appamaññānaṃ kathitatā anuññātā hoti.
[06]Pañhapucchakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Appamaññāvibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^703^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Patiṭṭhānaṭṭhenā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0189^ea^^a^V0.0190^ea^ sampayogavasena upanissayavasena ca okāsabhāvena. Piṭṭhapūvaodanakiṇṇanānāsambhāre pakkhipitvā madditvā katā ^b^surā^eb^ nāma. Madhukādipupphapanasādiphalaucchumuddikādinānāsambhārānaṃ rasā ciraparivāsitā ^b^merayaṃ^eb^ nāma, āsavoti attho.
[03]^b^704^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Taṃsampayuttattā^eb^ti viratisampayuttattā, viraticetanāsampayuttattā vā.

[03]^b^Kammapathā evā^eb^ti asabbasādhāraṇesu jhānādikoṭṭhāsesu kammapathakoṭṭhāsikā evāti attho. Surāpānampi ‘‘surāpānaṃ, bhikkhave, āsevitaṃ…pe… nirayasaṃvattanika’’nti (a. ni. 8.40) visuṃ kammapathabhāvena āgatanti vadanti. Evaṃ sati ekādasa kammapathā siyuṃ, tasmāssa yathāvuttesveva kammapathesu upakārakattasabhāgattavasena anupaveso daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Sattaitthipurisārammaṇatā^eb^ tathāgahitasaṅkhārārammaṇatāya daṭṭhabbā. ‘‘Pañca sikkhāpadā parittārammaṇā’’ti hi vuttaṃ. ‘‘Sabbāpi hi etā vītikkamitabbavatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā veracetanāhi eva viramantī’’ti (vibha. aṭṭha. 704) ca vakkhatīti.

[03]^b^Gorūpasīlako^eb^ pakatibhaddo. ^b^Kākaṇikamattassa atthāyā^eb^tiādi lobhavasena musākathane vuttaṃ. Dosavasena musākathane ca niṭṭhappatto saṅghabhedo gahito. Dosavasena parassa byasanatthāya musākathane pana tassa tassa guṇavasena appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā yojetabbā, mandādhimattabyasanicchāvasena ^a^V0.0191^ea^ ca. Nissaggiyathāvaravijjāmayiddhimayā sāhatthikāṇattikesveva pavisantīti dve eva gahitā.
[03]^b^Pañcapi kammapathā evā^eb^ti cetanāsaṅkhātaṃ pariyāyasīlaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, viratisīlaṃ pana maggakoṭṭhāsikanti. ^b^Tesaṃ panā^eb^ti sesasīlānaṃ.

[03]^b^712^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Koṭṭhāsabhāvenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, ‘‘patiṭṭhānabhāvenā’’ti pana vattabbaṃ. Ettha pana sikkhāpadavāre pahīnapañcābhabbaṭṭhānassa arahato viramitabbaverassa ^a^M0.0190^ea^ sabbathā abhāvā kiriyesu viratiyo na santīti na uddhaṭā, sekkhānaṃ pana pahīnapañcaverattepi taṃsabhāgatāya verabhūtānaṃ akusalānaṃ veranidānānaṃ lobhādīnañca sabbhāvā viratīnaṃ uppatti na na bhavissati. Akusalasamuṭṭhitāni ca kāyakammādīni tesaṃ kāyaduccaritādīni verāneva, tehi ca tesaṃ viratiyo honteva, yato naphalabhūtassapi uparimaggattayassa aṭṭhaṅgikatā hoti. Sikkhāvāre ca abhāvetabbatāya phaladhammāpi na sikkhitabbā, nāpi sikkhitasikkhassa uppajjamānā kiriyadhammāti na keci abyākatā sikkhāti uddhaṭā.
[06]Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^714^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sampattavirativasenā^eb^ti sampatte paccuppanne ārammaṇe yathāviramitabbato virativasenāti attho.
[06]Pañhapucchakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sikkhāpadavibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^718^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Eseva^eb^^a^M0.0191^ea^^a^V0.0192^ea^^b^nayo^eb^ti saṅkhepena dassetvā tameva nayaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘dhammappabhedassa hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Niruttipaṭibhānappabhedā tabbisayānaṃ atthādīnaṃ paccayuppannādibhedehi bhinditvā veditabbā.

[03]^b^‘‘Yaṃ kiñci paccayasamuppanna’’^eb^nti etena saccahetudhammapaccayākāravāresu āgatāni dukkhādīni gahitāni. Saccapaccayākāravāresu nibbānaṃ, pariyattivāre bhāsitattho, abhidhammabhājanīye vipāko kiriyañcāti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttānameva vasena pañca atthā veditabbā, tathā dhammā ca.

[03]^b^Vidahatī^eb^ti nibbattakahetuādīnaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ nibbacanaṃ, tadatthaṃ pana vibhāvetumāha ^b^‘‘pavatteti ceva pāpeti cā’’^eb^ti. Tesu purimo attho maggavajjesu daṭṭhabbo. Bhāsitampi hi avabodhanavasena atthaṃ pavattetīti. Maggo pana nibbānaṃ pāpetīti tasmiṃ pacchimo.

[03]^b^Dhammaniruttābhilāpe^eb^ti ettha ^b^dhamma^eb^-saddo sabhāvavācakoti katvā āha ^b^‘‘yā sabhāvaniruttī’’^eb^ti, aviparītaniruttīti attho. ^b^Tassā abhilāpe^eb^ti tassā niruttiyā avacanabhūtāya paññattiyā abhilāpeti keci vaṇṇayanti. Evaṃ sati paññatti abhilapitabbā ^a^V0.0193^ea^, na vacananti āpajjati, na ca vacanato aññaṃ abhilapitabbaṃ uccāretabbaṃ atthi, athāpi phassādivacanehi bodhetabbaṃ abhilapitabbaṃ siyā, evaṃ sati atthadhammavajjaṃ tehi bodhetabbaṃ na vijjatīti tesaṃ niruttibhāvo āpajjati. ‘‘Phassoti ca sabhāvanirutti, phassaṃ phassāti na sabhāvaniruttī’’ti dassitovāyamattho, na ca avacanaṃ evaṃpakāraṃ atthi, tasmā vacanabhūtāya eva tassā sabhāvaniruttiyā abhilāpe uccāraṇeti attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā^eb^ti vuttattā niruttisaddārammaṇāya sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato manodvāre niruttipaṭisambhidā ^a^M0.0192^ea^ pavattatīti vadanti. ‘‘Niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannārammaṇā’’ti ca vacanaṃ saddaṃ gahetvā pacchā jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti. Evaṃ pana aññasmiṃ paccuppannārammaṇe aññaṃ paccuppannārammaṇanti vuttanti āpajjati. Yathā pana dibbasotañāṇaṃ manussāmanussādisaddappabhedanicchayassa paccayabhūtaṃ taṃ taṃ saddavibhāvakaṃ, evaṃ sabhāvāsabhāvaniruttinicchayassa paccayabhūtaṃ paccuppannasabhāvaniruttisaddārammaṇaṃ taṃvibhāvakañāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidāti vuccamāne na pāḷivirodho hoti. ^b^Taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassā^eb^ti ca paccuppannasaddārammaṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ pavattayantassāti na na sakkā vattuṃ. Tampi hi ñāṇaṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ vibhāventaṃyeva taṃtaṃsaddapaccavekkhaṇānantaraṃ taṃtaṃpabhedanicchayahetuttā niruttiṃ bhindantaṃ paṭivijjhantameva uppajjatīti ca pabhedagatampi hotīti. ^b^Sabhāvaniruttī^eb^ti māgadhabhāsā adhippetāti tato aññaṃ sakkaṭanāmādisaddaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘aññaṃ panā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Byañjana^eb^nti nipātapadamāha.

[03]^b^Kathitaṃ^eb^ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. ^b^Bodhimaṇḍa^eb^-saddo paṭhamābhisambuddhaṭṭhāne eva daṭṭhabbo, na yattha katthaci bodhirukkhassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne. ^b^Suvaṇṇasalāka^eb^nti seṭṭhasalākaṃ, dhammadesanatthaṃ salākaṃ gahetvāti attho, ^b^na paṭisambhidāyaṃ ṭhitena^eb^ pavāritaṃ, tasmā paṭisambhidāto aññeneva pakārena jānitabbato na sakkaṭabhāsājānanaṃ paṭisambhidākiccanti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Idaṃ kathita^eb^nti māgadhabhāsāya sabhāvaniruttitāñāpanatthaṃ idaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ kathitanti attho. ^b^Chaddantavāraṇa^eb^ (jā. 1.16.97 ādayo) -^b^tittirajātakā^eb^dīsu (jā. 1.4.73 ādayo) tiracchānesu ca māgadhabhāsā ussannā, na oṭṭakādibhāsā sakkaṭaṃ vā.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0194^ea^ māgadhasesabhāsāsu. ^b^Sesā parivattanti^eb^ ekantena kālantare aññathā honti vinassanti ca. Māgadhā pana katthaci kadāci parivattantīpi na sabbattha sabbadā sabbathā ca parivattati, kappavināsepi tiṭṭhatiyevāti ^b^‘‘ayamevekā na parivattatī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Papañco^eb^ti cirāyananti attho. Buddhavacanameva cetassa visayo, teneva ‘‘nelaṅgo setapacchādo’’ti gāthaṃ pucchito citto gahapati ‘‘‘kiṃ nu kho etaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā bhāsita’nti? ‘Evaṃ gahapatī’ti. ‘Tena hi, bhante, muhuttaṃ āgametha, yāvassa atthaṃ pekkhāmī’’’ti (saṃ. ni. 4.347) āhāti vadanti.

[03]^b^Sabbatthakañāṇa^eb^nti ^a^M0.0193^ea^ atthādīsu ñāṇaṃ. Tañhi sabbesu tesu tīsu catūsupi vā pavattattā, kusalakiriyabhūtāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya dhammatthabhāvato tīsu eva vā pavattattā ^b^‘‘sabbatthakañāṇa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti sātthakānaṃ paccavekkhitabbattā sabbo attho etassātipi sabbatthakaṃ, sabbasmiṃ khittanti vā. Sekkhe pavattā arahattappattiyā visadā hontīti vadanti. Pubbayogo viya pana arahattappatti arahatopi paṭisambhidāvisadatāya paccayo na na hotīti pañcannampi yathāyogaṃ sekkhāsekkhapaṭisambhidāvisadattakāraṇatā yojetabbā.

[03]Pucchāya parato pavattā kathāti katvā aṭṭhakathā ^b^‘‘paripucchā’’^eb^ti vuttā. ^b^Paṭipattiṃ pūretabbaṃ maññissantī^eb^ti paṭipattigarutāya lābhaṃ hīḷentena satasahassagghanakampi kambalaṃ vāsiyā koṭṭetvā paribhaṇḍakaraṇaṃ mayā kataṃ āvajjitvā lābhagaruno pariyattidharā dhammakathikāva bhavituṃ na maññissantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettha ca therassa kaṅkhuppattiyā pubbe avisadataṃ dassetvā arahattappattassa pañhavissajjanena arahattappattiyā visadatā dassitā. ^b^Tissatthero^eb^ anantaraṃ vutto tissatthero evāti vadanti.

[03]^b^Pabhedo^eb^ nāma maggehi adhigatānaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ pabhedagamanaṃ. ^b^Adhigamo^eb^ tehi paṭilābho, tasmā so lokuttaro, pabhedo kāmāvacaro daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Na pana tathā^eb^ti yathā adhigamassa balavapaccayo hoti, na tathā pabhedassāti attho. Idāni pariyattiyādīnaṃ adhigamassa balavapaccayattābhāvaṃ, pubbayogassa ca balavapaccayattaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘pariyattisavanaparipucchā hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^paṭisambhidā nāma natthī^eb^ti paṭisambhidādhigamo natthīti adhippāyo. Idāni ^a^V0.0195^ea^ yaṃ vuttaṃ hoti, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘ime panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Pubbayogādhigamā hi dvepi visadakāraṇāti ‘‘pubbayogo pabhedassa balavapaccayo hotī’’ti vuttanti.
[06]Saṅgahavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^719^eb^^b^.^eb^ Hetuvāre ^a^M0.0194^ea^ kālattayepi hetuphaladhammā ‘‘atthā’’ti vuttā, tesañca hetudhammā ‘‘dhammā’’ti, dhammavāre veneyyavasena atītānañca saṅgahitattā ‘‘uppannā samuppannā’’tiādi na vuttanti atītapaccuppannā ‘‘atthā’’ti vuttā, taṃnibbattakā ca ‘‘dhammā’’ti idametesaṃ dvinnampi vārānaṃ nānattaṃ.
[06]Saccavārādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^725^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Avuttattā^eb^ti ‘‘tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇa’’nti sāmaññena vatvā visesena avuttattāti adhippāyo. Ettha ca kiriyānaṃ avipākattā dhammabhāvo na vuttoti. Yadi evaṃ vipākā na hontīti atthabhāvo ca na vattabboti? Na, paccayuppannattā. Evañce kusalākusalānampi atthabhāvo āpajjatīti. Nappaṭisiddho, vipākassa pana padhānahetutāya pākaṭattā dhammabhāvova tesaṃ vutto. Kiriyānaṃ paccayattā dhammabhāvo āpajjatīti ce? Nāyaṃ doso appaṭisiddhattā, kammaphalasambandhassa pana ahetuttā dhammabhāvo na vutto. Apica ‘‘ayaṃ imassa paccayo, idaṃ paccayuppanna’’nti evaṃ bhedaṃ akatvā kevalaṃ kusalākusale vipākakiriyadhamme ca sabhāvato paccavekkhantassa dhammapaṭisambhidā atthapaṭisambhidā ca hotītipi tesaṃ atthadhammatā na vuttāti veditabbā ^a^V0.0196^ea^. Kusalākusalavāresu ca dhammapaṭisambhidā kusalākusalānaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ sattivisesaṃ sanipphādetabbataṃ passantī nipphādetabbāpekkhā hotīti taṃsambandheneva ‘‘tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā’’ti vuttaṃ. Sabhāvadassanamattameva pana atthapaṭisambhidāya kiccaṃ nipphannaphalamattadassanatoti tassā nipphādakānapekkhattā vipākavāre ‘‘tesaṃ vipaccanake ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā’’ti na vuttanti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sabhāvapaññattiyā^eb^ti na sattādipaññattiyā, aviparītapaññattiyā vā. ^b^Khobhetvā^eb^ti lomahaṃsajananasādhukāradānādīhi khobhetvā. ^b^Puna dhammassavane^eb^^a^M0.0195^ea^^b^jānissathā^eb^ti appassutattā dutiyavāraṃ kathento tadeva kathessatīti adhippāyo.
[03]^b^746^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhūmidassanattha^eb^nti ettha kāmāvacarā lokuttarā ca bhūmi ‘‘bhūmī’’ti veditabbā, cittuppādā vāti.
[06]Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^747^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paccayasamuppannañca atthaṃ paccayadhammañcā^eb^ti vacanehi hetādipaccayasamuppannānaṃ kusalākusalarūpānampi atthapariyāyaṃ, hetādipaccayabhūtānaṃ vipākakiriyarūpānampi dhammapariyāyañca dasseti. Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya kāmāvacaravipākārammaṇatā mahaggatārammaṇatā ca paṭisambhidāñāṇārammaṇatte na yujjati paṭisambhidāñāṇānaṃ kāmāvacaralokuttarakusalesu kāmāvacarakiriyālokuttaravipākesu ca uppattito. Sabbañāṇārammaṇatāya sati yujjeyya, ‘‘yena ñāṇena tāni ñāṇāni jānātī’’ti (vibha. 726) vacanato pana na sabbañāṇārammaṇatāti kathayanti. Suttantabhājanīye pana ‘‘ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā’’ti avisesena vuttattā sabbañāṇārammaṇatā siyā. Abhidhammabhājanīyepi cittuppādavasena kathanaṃ niravasesakathananti yathādassitavisayavacanavasena ‘‘yena ñāṇena tāni ñāṇāni ^a^V0.0197^ea^ jānātī’’ti yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ aññārammaṇataṃ na paṭisedhetīti. Yathā ca atthapaṭisambhidāvisayānaṃ na niravasesena kathanaṃ abhidhammabhājanīye, evaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāvisayassapīti. Evaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya sabbañāṇavisayattā ‘‘tisso paṭisambhidā siyā parittārammaṇā siyā mahaggatārammaṇā siyā appamāṇārammaṇā’’ti (vibha. 749) vuttā.

[03]Yadipi ‘‘siyā atthapaṭisambhidā na maggārammaṇā’’ti (vibha. 749) vacanato abhidhammabhājanīye vuttapaṭisambhidāsveva pañhapucchakanayo pavatto. Na hi maggo paccayuppanno na hoti, abhidhammabhājanīye ca paṭisambhidāñāṇavisayā eva paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā vuttāti na tassā mahaggatārammaṇatāti. Evamapi dvepi etā pāḷiyo virujjhanti, tāsu balavatarāya ṭhatvā ^a^M0.0196^ea^ itarāya adhippāyo maggitabbo. Kusalākusalānaṃ pana paccayuppannattapaṭivedhopi kusalākusalabhāvapaṭivedhavinimutto natthīti nippariyāyā tattha dhammapaṭisambhidā ekantadhammavisayattā, tathā vipākakiriyānaṃ paccayabhāvapaṭivedhopi vipākakiriyabhāvapaṭivedhavinimutto natthīti nippariyāyā tattha atthapaṭisambhidā ekantikātthavisayattā. Kiñci pana ñāṇaṃ appaṭibhānabhūtaṃ natthi ñeyyappakāsanatoti sabbasmimpi ñāṇe nippariyāyā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā bhavituṃ arahati. Nippariyāyapaṭisambhidāsu pañhapucchakassa pavattiyaṃ dvepi pāḷiyo na virujjhanti.

[03]^b^Saddārammaṇattā bahiddhārammaṇā^eb^ti ettha parassa abhilāpasaddārammaṇattāti bhavitabbaṃ. Na hi saddārammaṇatā bahiddhārammaṇatāya kāraṇaṃ saddassa ajjhattassa ca sabbhāvāti. Anuvattamāno ca so eva saddoti visesanaṃ na katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06]Pañhapucchakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^751^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Okāsaṭṭhena^eb^^a^M0.0197^ea^^a^V0.0198^ea^ sampayuttā dhammā ārammaṇañcāpi^b^ ñāṇassa vatthu. Yāthāvakavatthuvibhāvanā^eb^ti nahetādiavitathekappakāravatthuvibhāvanā. Yathā ekaṃ nahetu, tathā ekaṃ aññampīti hi gahetabbaṃ avitathasāmaññayuttaṃ ñāṇārammaṇaṃ yāthāvakavatthu. Yāthāvakena vā avitathasāmaññena vatthuvibhāvanā ^b^yāthāvakavatthuvibhāvanā^eb^.

[03]^b^Dukānurūpehī^eb^ti dukamātikānurūpehīti vadanti. Osānadukassa pana dukamātikaṃ anissāya vuttattā dukabhāvānurūpehīti vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ ^b^tikānurūpehī^eb^ti etthāpi daṭṭhabbaṃ. Osānaduke pana ^b^attho^eb^ti phalaṃ, anekatthattā dhātusaddānaṃ taṃ janetīti ^b^atthajāpikā,^eb^ kāraṇagatā paññā. Jāpito janito attho etissāti ^b^jāpitatthā,^eb^ kāraṇapaññāsadisī phalappakāsanabhūtā phalasampayuttā paññā.

[03]^b^760^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Catasso kho imā, sāriputta, yoniyo. Katamā…pe… yo kho maṃ, sāriputta, evaṃ jāna’’nti (ma. ni. 1.152) vacanena ^b^catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ, ‘‘nirayañcāhaṃ, sāriputta, pajānāmī’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.153) ^b^pañcagatiparicchedakaṃ. ‘‘Saṃyuttake āgatāni tesattati ñāṇāni, sattasattati ñāṇānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, tattha pana nidānavagge sattasattati āgatāni catucattārīsañca, tesattati pana paṭisambhidāmagge sutamayādīni āgatāni ^a^V0.0199^ea^ dissanti, na saṃyuttaketi. ^b^Aññānipī^eb^ti etena idha ekakādivasena vuttaṃ, aññattha ca ‘‘pubbante ñāṇa’’ntiādinā, brahmajālādīsu ca ‘‘tayidaṃ tathāgato pajānāti ‘imāni diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni evaṃ gahitānī’ti’’ādinā vuttaṃ anekañāṇappabhedaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Yāthāvapaṭivedhato sayañca akampiyaṃ puggalañca taṃsamaṅgiṃ ñeyyesu adhibalaṃ karotīti āha ^b^‘‘akampiyaṭṭhena upatthambhakaṭṭhena cā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0198^ea^ sabbaññutaṃ. Paṭijānanavasena sabbaññutaṃ abhimukhaṃ gacchanti, aṭṭha vā parisā upasaṅkamantīti ^b^āsabhā,^eb^ buddhā. ^b^Idaṃ panā^eb^ti buddhānaṃ ṭhānaṃ sabbaññutameva vadati. ^b^Tiṭṭhamānovā^eb^ti avadantopi tiṭṭhamānova paṭijānāti nāmāti attho. ^b^Aṭṭhasu parisāsu^eb^ ‘‘abhijānāmahaṃ, sāriputta, anekasataṃ khattiyaparisaṃ…pe… tatra vata maṃ bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā okkamissatīti nimittametaṃ, sāriputta, na samanupassāmī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.151) vacanena dassitākampiyañāṇayutto dasabalohanti ^b^abhītanādaṃ nadati. Sīhanādasuttena^eb^ khandhakavagge āgatena.

[03]‘‘Devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ vattatī’’ti (a. ni. 4.31) suttasesena sappurisūpassayādīnaṃ phalasampatti pavatti, purimasappurisūpassayādiṃ upanissāya pacchimasappurisūpassayādīnaṃ sampatti pavatti vā vuttāti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena tattha ca cakka-saddassa gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ paṭivedhoti ^b^‘‘phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphattiparassa bujjhanamattena hotīti ^b^‘‘aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇappavatti tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ, pavattitacakkassa cakkavattino cakkaratanaṭṭhānaṃ viya.

[03]Samādīyantīti ^b^samādānāni,^eb^ tāni pana samādiyitvā katāni hontīti āha ^b^‘‘samādiyitvā katāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kammameva vā kammasamādāna^eb^nti etena samādāna-saddassa apubbatthābhāvaṃ dasseti muttagata-sadde gata-saddassa viya.
[03]^b^Agatigāmini^eb^nti ^a^V0.0200^ea^ nibbānagāminiṃ. Vuttañhi ‘‘nibbānañcāhaṃ, sāriputta, pajānāmi nibbānagāminiñca paṭipada’’nti (ma. ni. 1.153).
[03]^b^Hānabhāgiyadhamma^eb^nti hānabhāgiyasabhāvaṃ, kāmasahagatasaññādidhammaṃ vā. ^b^Taṃ kāraṇa^eb^nti pubbeva katābhisaṅkhārādiṃ.

[03]^b^‘‘Idānī’’^eb^ti etassa ‘‘iminā anukkamena vuttānīti veditabbānī’’ti iminā saha yojanā kātabbā. Kilesāvaraṇaṃ tadabhāvañcāti ^b^kilesāvaraṇābhāvaṃ^eb^. Kilesakkhayādhigamassa hi kilesāvaraṇaṃ ^b^aṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ tadabhāvo ^b^ṭhānaṃ^eb^. Anadhigamassa kilesāvaraṇaṃ ^b^ṭhānaṃ,^eb^ tadabhāvo ^a^M0.0199^ea^^b^aṭṭhāna^eb^nti. Tattha tadabhāvaggahaṇena gahitaṃ ‘‘atthi dinna’’ntiādikāya sammādiṭṭhiyā ṭhitiṃ tabbiparītāya ṭhānābhāvañca adhigamassa ṭhānaṃ passantena iminā ñāṇena adhigamānadhigamānaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānabhūte kilesāvaraṇatadabhāve passati bhagavāti imamatthaṃ sādhento āha ^b^‘‘lokiyasammādiṭṭhiṭhitidassanato niyatamicchādiṭṭhiṭhānābhāvadassanato cā’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca adhigamaṭṭhānadassanameva adhippetaṃ upari bhabbapuggalavaseneva vipākāvaraṇābhāvadassanādikassa vakkhamānattā. Iminā pana ñāṇena sijjhanato pasaṅgena itarampi vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Dhātuvemattadassanato^eb^ti rāgādīnaṃ adhimattatādivasena taṃsahitānaṃ dhātūnaṃ vemattatādassanato, ‘‘ayaṃ imissā dhātuyā adhimattattā rāgacarito’’tiādinā cariyāhetūnaṃ vā, rāgādayo eva vā pakatibhāvato dhātūti rāgādivemattadassanatoti attho. ^b^Payogaṃ anādiyitvā^eb^ti santatimahāmattāṅgulimālādīnaṃ viya kāmarāgabyāpādādivasena payogaṃ anādiyitvā.

[03]^b^761^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na hetumevā^eb^ti ettha ca na hetū evāti attho, byañjanasiliṭṭhatāvasena pana rassattaṃ ^b^ma^eb^-kāro ca kato ‘‘adukkhamasukhā’’ti ettha viya. ^b^Imināpi nayenā^eb^ti ettha purimanayena hetubhāvādipaṭikkhepo, pacchimanayena nahetudhammādikoṭṭhāsasaṅgahoti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo. ^b^Cuti^eb^ggahaṇena cutiparicchinnāya ekāya jātiyā gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, ^b^bhava^eb^ggahaṇena navadhā vuttabhavassa. Tadantogadhatāya tattha tattha ^b^pariyāpannatā^eb^ vuttā. ^b^Uppannaṃ manoviññāṇaviññeyyamevā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0201^ea^ ‘‘na rūpaṃ viya uppannā chaviññāṇaviññeyyā’’ti rūpato etesaṃ visesanaṃ karoti.
[03]^b^762^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kappato kappaṃ gantvāpi na uppajjatī^eb^ti na kadāci tathā uppajjati. Na hi khīrādīnaṃ viya etesaṃ yathāvuttalakkhaṇavilakkhaṇatā atthīti dasseti.

[03]^b^763^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samodhānetvā^eb^ti loke vijjamānaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ samodhānetvā. Etena mahattepi avibhāvakattaṃ dassento sukhumattā na vibhāvessatīti ^a^M0.0200^ea^ vādapathaṃ chindati. ^b^Cakkhupasāde^eb^ mama vatthumhīti attho. ^b^Visayo^eb^ti issariyaṭṭhānanti adhippāyo.
[03]^b^764^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abbokiṇṇā^eb^ti abyavahitā, anantaritāti attho. Vavatthitānampi paṭipāṭiniyamo tena paṭikkhittoti attho. ^b^Anantaratā^eb^ti anantarapaccayatā etena paṭikkhittāti attho.
[03]^b^765^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samanantaratā^eb^ti ca samanantarapaccayatā.

[03]^b^766^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ābhujanato^eb^ti ābhuggakaraṇato, nivattanato icceva attho. Ettha ca ‘‘pañca viññāṇā anābhogā’’ti ābhogasabhāvā na hontīti attho, ‘‘pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ natthi āvaṭṭanā vā’’tiādīsupi āvaṭṭanabhāvo vātiādinā attho daṭṭhabbo.
[03]^b^Na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānātī^eb^ti ettha na sabbe rūpādidhammā dhammaggahaṇena gahitāti yathādhippetadhammadassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti evaṃ vutta’’^eb^nti āha.

[03]Rūpādīsu abhinipatanaṃ tehi samāgamo tesantipi vattuṃ yujjatīti āha ^b^‘‘rūpādīnaṃ abhinipātamatta’’^eb^nti. Kammatthe vā sāmivacanaṃ. Viññāṇehi abhinipatitabbāni hi rūpādīnīti. ^b^Idaṃ vuttaṃ hotī^eb^tiādīsu hi ayaṃ adhippāyo – ārammaṇakaraṇena paṭivijānitabbāni rūpādīni ṭhapetvā kusalākusalacetanāya taṃsampayuttānañca yathāvuttānaṃ sahajapubbaṅgamadhammena paṭivijānitabbānaṃ paṭivijānanaṃ etesaṃ natthīti. Evañca katvā ^b^‘‘dassanādimattato^eb^^a^V0.0202^ea^^b^pana muttā aññā etesaṃ kusalādipaṭiviññatti nāma natthī’’^eb^ti kiccantaraṃ paṭisedheti.

[03]Avipākabhāvena aññaṃ abyākatasāmaññaṃ anivārento kusalākusalaggahaṇañca karotīti cavanapariyosānañca ^b^kiccaṃ^eb^. ^b^Pi^eb^-saddena sahajavanakāni vīthicittāni sampiṇḍetvā pañcadvāre paṭisedhane ayaṃ adhippāyo siyā – ‘‘manasā ce paduṭṭhena…pe… pasannena bhāsati vā karoti vā’’ti (dha. pa. 1-2) evaṃ vuttā bhāsanakaraṇakarā, taṃsadisā ca sukhadukkhuppādakā balavanto chaṭṭhadvārikā eva dhammaggahaṇena gahitāti na tesaṃ pañcadvārikajavanena paṭivijānanaṃ atthi, dubbalānaṃ pana pubbaṅgamapaṭivijānanaṃ tattha na paṭisiddhaṃ ‘‘na ^a^M0.0201^ea^ kāyakammaṃ na vacīkammaṃ paṭṭhapetī’’ti viññattidvayajanakasseva paṭṭhapanapaṭikkhepena dubbalassa manokammassa anuññātattā. Tathā kāyasucaritādikusalakammaṃ karomīti, tabbiparītaṃ akusalaṃ kammaṃ karomīti ca kusalākusalasamādānaṃ pañcadvārikajavanena na hoti. Tathā paṭiccasamuppādavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttā ‘‘pañcadvārikacuti ca na pañcadvārikacittehi hoti cuticittassa ataṃdvārikattā’’ti. Yā panāyaṃ pāḷi ‘‘pañcahi viññāṇehi na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā’’ti, tassā rūpādīnaṃ āpāthamattaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ kañci dhammasabhāvaṃ na paṭivijānātīti ayamattho dissati. Na hi rūpaṃ paṭiggaṇhantampi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpanti ca gaṇhātīti. Sampaṭicchanassapi rūpanīlādiākārapaṭivijānanaṃ natthīti kiñci dhammassa paṭivijānanaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ, pañcahi pana viññāṇehi sātisayaṃ tassa vijānananti ‘‘aññatra abhinipātamattā’’ti na vuttaṃ. Yassa pāḷiyaṃ bahiddhāpaccuppannārammaṇatā vuttā, tato aññaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidaṃ icchantehi pañcadvārajavanena paṭisambhidāñāṇassa sahuppatti paṭisiddhā. ^b^Rūpārūpadhamme^eb^ti rūpārūpāvacaradhammeti attho.

[03]^b^Pañcadvārikacittena na paṭibujjhatī^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu rūpādīnaṃ āpāthagamane niddāpaṭibodho hotīti? Na, paṭhamaṃ manodvārikajavanassa uppattitoti dassento āha ^b^‘‘niddāyantassa hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Palobhetvā^eb^ saccasupinena.
[03]^b^Abyākatoyeva^eb^ āvajjanamattasseva uppajjanatoti vadanti. Evaṃ vadantehi manodvārepi āvajjanaṃ dvattikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā bhavaṅgaṃ otaratīti adhippetanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Tassā^eb^^a^V0.0203^ea^^b^eva vasenā^eb^ti tassā vasena ekavidhena ñāṇavatthu hotīti ca, veditabbanti ca yojanā kātabbā.
[06]Ekakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^767^eb^^b^.^eb^ Attha-saddo aññatra sabhāvaṃ gahetvā adhikaraṇesu pavattamāno adhikaraṇavasena liṅgaparivattiṃ gacchatīti adhippāyena jāpitā ^a^M0.0202^ea^ ca sā atthā cāti ^b^jāpitatthā^eb^ti ayamattho vibhāvitoti daṭṭhabbo.
[06]Dukaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^768^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paññāpariṇāmitesū^eb^ti paññāya paripācitesu. ‘‘Yogavihitesūti idañca visayavisesanamattameva, tasmā yāni paññāya vihitāni ahesuṃ honti bhavissanti ca, sabbāni tāni yogavihitānīti daṭṭhabbāni. Sikkhitvā kātabbaṃ ^b^sippaṃ,^eb^ itaraṃ ^b^kammaṃ^eb^. Ayametesaṃ viseso. ^b^Vaḍḍhakīkamma^eb^nti ca asikkhitvāpi kātabbaṃ thūlakammaṃ ^b^‘‘kamma’’^eb^nti daṭṭhabbaṃ, paññā eva vā tattha tattha ^b^‘‘kammaṃ sippa’’^eb^nti ca veditabbā. ^b^Nāgamaṇḍalaṃ^eb^ nāma maṇḍalaṃ katvā sappe vijjāya pakkositvā baliṃ datvā visāpanayanaṃ. ^b^Parittaṃ^eb^ rakkhā, yena ‘‘phū’’ti mukhavātaṃ datvā visaṃ apanayanti, so uṇṇanābhiādimanto ^b^phudhamanakamanto^eb^. ‘‘A ā’’tiādikā mātikā ‘‘ka kā’’tiādiko tappabhedo ca ^b^lekhā^eb^.

[03]Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ ^b^sakaṃ,^eb^ itaraṃ ^b^nosakaṃ^eb^. Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbānaṃ tappaṭivedhapaccayabhāvena ^b^anulomanaṃ^eb^ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pubbe ‘‘yogavihitesu vā kammāyatanesū’’tiādinā paññā ^a^V0.0204^ea^ vuttā, puna tassā vevacanavasena ‘‘anulomikaṃ khanti’’ntiādi vuttanti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘anu…pe… paññāvevacanānī’’^eb^ti āha. Ettha ca ^b^evarūpi^eb^nti yathāvuttakammāyatanādivisayaṃ kammassakatasaccānulomikasabhāvaṃ aniccādipavattiākārañcāti attho. Yathāvuttā ca bhūmisabhāvapavattiākāraniddesā khantiādīhi yojetabbā. Yassā paññāya dhammā nijjhānapajānanakiccasaṅkhātaṃ olokanaṃ khamanti aviparītasabhāvattā, sā paññā dhammānaṃ nijjhānakkhamanaṃ etissā atthīti ^b^dhammanijjhānakkhantī^eb^ti attho.

[03]^b^769^eb^^b^.^eb^ Asaṃvaraṃ muñcatīti samādānasampattaviratisampayuttacetanā ^b^‘‘sīlaṃ pūrentassa muñcacetanā’’^eb^ti vuttā. Pubbāparapaññāya ca dānasīlamayatāvacanato muñcāparacetanāvasena ‘‘ārabbhā’’ti, pubbacetanāvasena ‘‘adhikiccā’’ti ca vattuṃ yuttanti ‘‘adhikiccā’’tipi pāṭho yujjati.

[03]^b^770^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcasīladasasīlāni ^a^M0.0203^ea^ viññāṇassa jātiyā ca paccayabhūtesu saṅkhārabhavesu antogadhānīti ^b^‘‘uppādā vā’’^eb^tiādikāya dhammaṭṭhitipāḷiyā saṅgahitāni. Bhavanibbattakasīlassa paññāpanaṃ satipi savane na tathāgatadesanāyattanti bhikkhuādīnampi taṃ vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Adhipaññāya paññā^eb^ti adhipaññāya antogadhā paññā. Atha vā adhipaññānibbattesu, tadadhiṭṭhānesu vā dhammesu adhipaññā-saddo daṭṭhabbo, tattha paññā ^b^adhipaññāya paññā^eb^.

[03]^b^771^eb^^b^.^eb^ Apāyuppādanakusalatā apāyakosallaṃ siyāti maññamāno pucchati ^b^‘‘apāyakosallaṃ kathaṃ paññā nāma jātā’’^eb^ti. Taṃ pana parassa adhippāyaṃ nivattento ^b^‘‘paññavāyeva hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Tatrupāyā^eb^ti tatra tatra upāyabhūtā. Ṭhāne uppatti etassāti ^b^ṭhānuppattiyaṃ^eb^. Kiṃ taṃ? Kāraṇajānanaṃ, bhayādīnaṃ uppattikkhaṇe tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne lahūppajjanakanti vuttaṃ hoti.
[06]Tikaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^793^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na^eb^^a^V0.0205^ea^^b^paritassatī^eb^ti ‘‘api nāma me taṇḍulādīni siyu’’nti na pattheti, tadabhāvena vā na uttasati.

[03]^b^796^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aparappaccaye^eb^ti parena napattiyāyitabbe. ^b^Dhamme ñāṇa^eb^nti saccavisayaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Ariyasaccesu hi ^b^dhamma^eb^-saddo tesaṃ aviparītasabhāvattāti. Saṅkhatapavaro vā ariyamaggo tassa ca phalaṃ ^b^dhammo,^eb^ tattha paññā taṃsahagatā ^b^dhamme ñāṇaṃ^eb^. Na aññañāṇuppādanaṃ ^b^nayanayanaṃ,^eb^ ñāṇasseva pana pavattivisesoti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa kicca’’^eb^nti. Ettha ca ^b^iminā dhammenā^eb^ti maggañāṇenāti vuttaṃ, duvidhampi pana maggaphalañāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇāya ca mūlaṃ, kāraṇañca nayanayanassāti duvidhenapi tena dhammenāti na na yujjati, tathā catusaccadhammassa ñātattā, maggaphalasaṅkhātassa ca dhammassa saccapaṭivedhasampayogaṃ gatattā nayanaṃ hotīti tena iminā dhammena ^a^M0.0204^ea^ ñāṇavisayabhāvena, ñāṇasampayogena vā ñātenāti ca attho na na yujjati.

[03]Yadipi sabbena sabbaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ dukkhaṃ abhijānanti, tathāpi paccuppanne sasantatipariyāpanne savisese abhiniveso hotīti āha ^b^‘‘na taññeva ima’’^eb^nti. Diṭṭhena adiṭṭhena nayato ^b^nayanañāṇaṃ,^eb^ adiṭṭhassa diṭṭhatāya kāraṇabhūtattā ^b^kāraṇañāṇaṃ,^eb^ anurūpatthavācako vā kāraṇa-saddoti dhamme ñāṇassa anurūpañāṇanti attho.

[03]^b^Sammutimhi ñāṇa^eb^nti dhamme ñāṇādīnaṃ viya sātisayassa paṭivedhakiccassa abhāvā visayobhāsanamattajānanasāmaññena ñāṇanti sammatesu antogadhanti attho. Sammutivasena vā pavattaṃ ^b^sammutimhi ñāṇaṃ,^eb^ avasesaṃ pana itarañāṇattayavisabhāgaṃ ñāṇaṃ tabbisabhāgasāmaññena sammutiñāṇamhi paviṭṭhattā ^b^sammutiñāṇaṃ^eb^ nāma hotīti.
[03]^b^797^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kilesamūlake cā^eb^ti nīvaraṇamūlake ca kāmabhavadhamme.

[03]^b^798^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sā hissā^eb^ti ettha ^b^assā^eb^ti yo ‘‘kāmesu vītarāgo hotī’’ti evaṃ vutto, assa ^a^V0.0206^ea^ paṭhamajjhānasamaṅgissāti attho. ^b^Svevā^eb^ti etena kāmesu vītarāgabhāvanāvatthasseva paṭhamajjhānasamaṅgissa gahaṇe pavatte tassa tato paraṃ avatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kāmesu vītarāgo samāno’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Catutthamaggapaññā chaṭṭhābhiññābhāvappattiyā taṃ ^b^paṭivijjhati^eb^ nāma, itarā tadupanissayattā. Yathānurūpaṃ vā āsavakkhayabhāvato, phale vā āsavakkhaye sati yathānurūpaṃ taṃnibbattanato catūsupi maggesu paññā ^b^chaṭṭhaṃ abhiññaṃ paṭivijjhatī^eb^ti daṭṭhabbā.

[03]^b^799^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāmasahagatā^eb^ti vatthukāmārammaṇā. ^b^Codentī^eb^ti kāmābhimukhaṃ tanninnaṃ karontīti attho. ^b^Tadanudhammatā^eb^ti tadanudhammā icceva vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Tā^eb^-saddassa apubbatthābhāvatoti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘tadanurūpasabhāvā’’^eb^ti. Nikantiṃ, nikantisahagatacittuppādaṃ vā ^b^‘‘micchāsatī’’^eb^ti vadati. ‘‘Aho vata me avitakkaṃ uppajjeyyā’’ti avitakkārammaṇā ^b^avitakkasahagatā^eb^.
[03]^b^801^eb^^b^.^eb^ Adhigamabhāvena ^a^M0.0205^ea^ abhimukhaṃ jānantassa ^b^abhijānantassa,^eb^ abhivisiṭṭhena vā ñāṇena jānantassa, anārammaṇabhūtañca taṃ ṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karontassāti attho.
[03]^b^802^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vasitāpañcakarahitaṃ jhānaṃ ^b^appaguṇaṃ^eb^. Ettha catasso paṭipadā cattāri ārammaṇānīti paññāya paṭipadārammaṇuddesena paññā eva uddiṭṭhāti sā eva vibhattāti.
[06]Catukkaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^804^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhī^eb^ti samādhiaṅgabhāvena paññā uddiṭṭhāti. Pītipharaṇatādivacanena hi tameva vibhajati, ‘‘so imameva kāyaṃ vivekajena pītisukhena abhisandetī’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 1.226; ma. ni. 1.427) nayena pītiyā sukhassa ca pharaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Pītipharaṇatāsukhapharaṇatāhi ārammaṇe ṭhatvā catutthajjhānassa uppādanato ^b^‘‘pādā viyā’’^eb^ti tā vuttā.

[03]Dutiyapañcake ^a^V0.0207^ea^ ca ^b^‘‘pañcañāṇiko’’^eb^ti samādhimukhena pañcañāṇāneva uddiṭṭhāni niddiṭṭhāni cāti daṭṭhabbāni. Lokiyasamādhissa paccanīkāni nīvaraṇapaṭhamajjhānanikantiādīni niggahetabbāni. Aññe kilesā vāretabbā, imassa pana arahattasamādhissa paṭippassaddhasabbakilesattā na niggahetabbaṃ vāretabbañca atthīti maggānantaraṃ samāpattikkhaṇe ca appayogeneva adhigatattā ca ṭhapitattā ca, aparihānivasena ṭhapitattā vā ^b^na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato. Sativepullappattattā^eb^ti etena appavattamānāyapi satiyā satibahulatāya sato eva nāmāti dasseti. ^b^Yathāparicchinnakālavasenā^eb^ti etena paricchindanasatiyā satoti.
[06]Pañcakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^805^eb^^b^.^eb^ Visuddhibhāvaṃ ^a^M0.0206^ea^ dassento ^b^‘‘dūra…pe… rammaṇāyā’’^eb^ti āha. Sotadhātuvisuddhīti ca cittacetasikā dhammā vuttāti tattha ñāṇaṃ ^b^sotadhātuvisuddhiyā ñāṇaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Cetopariyañāṇa’’nti idameva atthavasena ^b^‘‘paracitte ñāṇa’’^eb^nti uddhaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Cutūpapātañāṇassa dibbacakkhuñāṇekadesattā ^b^‘‘vaṇṇadhātuārammaṇā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Muddhappattena cutūpapātañāṇasaṅkhātena dibbacakkhuñāṇena sabbaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇanti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06]Chakkaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^806^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tadeva ñāṇa^eb^nti chabbidhampi paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ vipassanārammaṇabhāvena saha gahetvā vuttanti adhippāyo. ^b^Dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇenā^eb^ti chapi ñāṇāni saṅkhipitvā vuttena ñāṇena. ^b^Khayadhamma^eb^ntiādinā ^a^V0.0208^ea^ hi pakārena pavattañāṇassa dassanaṃ, ñāṇavipassanādassanato vipassanāpaṭivipassanādassanamattamevāti na taṃ aṅganti adhippāyo. Pāḷiyaṃ pana sabbattha ñāṇavacanena aṅgānaṃ vuttattā ^b^nirodhadhammanti ñāṇa^eb^nti ^b^iti^eb^-saddena pakāsetvā vuttaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ sattamaṃ ñāṇanti ayamattho dissati. Na hi yampi taṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, tampi ñāṇanti sambandho hoti taṃñāṇaggahaṇe etasmiṃ ñāṇabhāvadassanassa anadhippetattā, ‘‘khayadhammaṃ…pe… nirodhadhamma’’nti etesaṃ sambandhābhāvappasaṅgato cāti.
[06]Sattakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^808^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vihāritabbaṭṭhenā^eb^ti paccanīkadhamme, dukkhaṃ vā vicchinditvā pavattetabbaṭṭhena.
[06]Aṭṭhakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^809^eb^^b^.^eb^ Avijjamānaṃ ^a^M0.0207^ea^ ṭhānaṃ ^b^aṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ natthi ṭhānanti vā ^b^aṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Esa ^b^‘‘anavakāso’’^eb^ti etthāpi nayo. Tadatthanigamanamattameva hi ‘‘netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī’’ti vacananti. Asukhe sukhanti diṭṭhivipallāsova idha sukhato upagamanassa ṭhānanti adhippetanti dassento ^b^‘‘ekanta…pe… attadiṭṭhivasenā’’^eb^ti padhānadiṭṭhimāha. Bhedānurūpassa sāvanaṃ ^b^anussāvanaṃ,^eb^ bhedānurūpena vā vacanena viññāpanaṃ.
[03]Liṅge ^a^V0.0209^ea^ parivatte ca so eva ekakammanibbattito bhavaṅgappabandho jīvitindriyappabandho ca, nāññoti āha ^b^‘‘api parivattaliṅga’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ayaṃ pañho^eb^ti ñāpanicchānibbattā kathā.

[03]^b^Saṅgāmacatukkaṃ^eb^ sapattavasena yojetabbaṃ. Sabbattha ca purimaṃ abhisandhicittaṃ appamāṇaṃ, vadhakacittaṃ pana tadārammaṇañca jīvitindriyaṃ ānantariyānānantariyabhāve pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Puthujjanasseva taṃ dinnaṃ hoti^eb^. Kasmā? Yathā vadhakacittaṃ paccuppannārammaṇampi jīvitindriyappabandhavicchedanavasena ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattati, na evaṃ cāgacetanā. Sā hi cajitabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cajanamattameva hoti, aññasakakaraṇañca tassa cajanaṃ, tasmā yassa taṃ sakaṃ kataṃ, tasseva dinnaṃ hotīti.

[03]^b^Saṇṭha…pe… kappavināseyeva muccatī^eb^ti idaṃ kappaṭṭhakathāya na sameti. Tattha hi ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kathā. aṭṭha. 654-657) vuttaṃ ‘‘āpāyikoti idaṃ suttaṃ yaṃ so ekaṃ kappaṃ asītibhāge katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṃ kālaṃ tiṭṭheyya, taṃ āyukappaṃ sandhāya vutta’’nti. ^b^Kappavināseyevā^eb^ti pana āyukappavināseyevāti atthe sati natthi virodho. Ettha ca ^b^saṇṭhahante^eb^ti idaṃ sve vinassissatīti viya abhūtaparikappavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Ekadivasameva paccati^eb^ tato paraṃ kappābhāvena āyukappassapi abhāvatoti avirodhato atthayojanā daṭṭhabbā.
[03]^b^Pakatatto^eb^ti anukkhitto. ^b^Samānasaṃvāsako^eb^ti apārājiko.

[03]^b^Kiṃ^eb^^a^M0.0208^ea^^b^pana ta^eb^nti yo so ‘‘niyato’’ti vutto, taṃ kiṃ niyametīti attho. Tasseva pana yathāpucchitassa niyatassa micchattasammattaniyatadhammānaṃ viya sabhāvato vijjamānataṃ yathāpucchitañca niyāmakahetuṃ paṭisedhetvā yena ‘‘niyato’’ti ‘‘sattakkhattuparamādiko’’ti ca vuccati, taṃ yathādhippetakāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sammāsambuddhena hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Jātassa kumārassa viya ariyāya jātiyā jātassa ^b^nāmamattametaṃ^eb^ niyatasattakkhattuparamādikaṃ, niyatāniyatabhedaṃ nāmanti attho. Yadi pubbahetu niyāmako, sotāpanno ca niyatoti sotāpattimaggato uddhaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ upanissayabhāvato pubbahetukiccaṃ, tato pubbe pana pubbahetukiccaṃ natthīti sotāpattimaggassa ^b^upanissayābhāvo āpajjati^eb^. Yadi hi tassapi pubbahetu upanissayo siyā, so ca niyāmakoti sotāpattimagguppattito pubbe eva niyato siyā, tañca aniṭṭhaṃ, tasmāssa ^a^V0.0210^ea^ pubbahetunā ahetukatā āpannāti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘iccassa ahetu appaccayā nibbattiṃ pāpuṇātī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Paṭiladdhamaggo^eb^ sotāpattimaggo, teneva sattakkhattuparamādiniyame sati sattamabhavādito uddhaṃ pavattanakassa dukkhassa mūlabhūtā kilesā teneva khīṇāti upari tayo maggā akiccakā hontīti attho. Yadi upari tayo maggā sattakkhattuparamādikaṃ niyamenti, tato ca añño sotāpanno natthīti sotāpattimaggassa akiccakatā nippayojanatā āpajjatīti attho. Atha sakkāyadiṭṭhādippahānaṃ dassanakiccaṃ, tesaṃ pahānena sattakkhattuparamāditāya bhavitabbaṃ. Sā cuparimaggehi eva hotīti sattamabhavādito uddhaṃ pavattito tena vinā vuṭṭhāne sakkāyadiṭṭhādippahānena ca tena vinā bhavitabbanti āha ^b^‘‘paṭhamamaggena ca anuppajjitvāva kilesā khepetabbā hontī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na añño koci niyametī^eb^ti nāmakaraṇanimittato vipassanāto añño koci niyāmako nāma natthīti attho. Vipassanāva niyametīti ca nāmakaraṇanimittataṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘iti sammāsambuddhena gahitanāmamattameva ta’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Na uppajjantīti pana atthī^eb^ti ‘‘na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjatī’’tiādiṃ (ma. ni. 1.285; 2.341; mahāva. 11; kathā. 405) imissā lokadhātuyā ṭhatvā vadantena bhagavatā ‘‘kiṃ panāvuso ^a^M0.0209^ea^ sāriputta, atthetarahi aññe samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhagavatā samasamā sambodhiyanti evaṃ puṭṭhāhaṃ, bhante, noti vadeyya’’nti (dī. ni. 3.161) vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ‘‘aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā’’ti (ma. ni. 3.129) imaṃ suttaṃ dassentena dhammasenāpatinā ca buddhakkhettabhūtaṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha anuppatti vuttā hotīti adhippāyo.

[03]‘‘Yo pana bhikkhū’’tiādinā vuttāni sikkhāpadāni ^b^mātikā,^eb^ tāya antarahitāya nidānuddesasaṅkhāte pātimokkhe pabbajjūpasampadākammesu ca ^b^sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti attho. Pātimokkhe vā antogadhā pabbajjā upasampadā ca tadubhayābhāve pātimokkhābhāvato, tasmā pātimokkhe, tāsu ca ^b^sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Osakkitaṃ nāmā^eb^ti pacchimapaṭivedhasīlabhedadvayaṃ ekato katvā tato paraṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti attho.
[03]^b^Tā^eb^ti rasmiyo. ^b^Kāruñña^eb^nti paridevanakāruññaṃ.
[03]^b^Anacchariyattā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0211^ea^ dvīsu uppajjamānesu acchariyattābhāvadosatoti attho. ^b^Vivādabhāvato^eb^ti vivādābhāvatthaṃ dve na uppajjantīti attho.

[03]Ekaṃ buddhaṃ dhāretīti ^b^ekabuddhadhāraṇī^eb^. Etena evaṃsabhāvā ete buddhaguṇā, yena dutiyabuddhaguṇe dhāretuṃ asamatthā ayaṃ lokadhātūti dasseti. Paccayavisesanipphannānañhi dhammānaṃ sabhāvaviseso na sakkā dhāretunti. Samaṃ uddhaṃ pajjatīti ^b^samupādikā,^eb^ udakassopari samaṃ gāminīti attho. ^b^Dvinnampī^eb^ti dvepi, dvinnampi vā sarīrabhāraṃ. ^b^Chādenta^eb^nti rocayamānaṃ. ^b^Sakiṃ bhuttovā^eb^ti ekampi ālopaṃ ajjhoharitvāva mareyyāti attho.

[03]^b^Atidhammabhārenā^eb^ti dhammena nāma pathavī tiṭṭheyya, sā kiṃ teneva calatīti adhippāyo. Puna thero ‘‘ratanaṃ nāma loke kuṭumbaṃ sandhārentaṃ abhimatañca lokena attano garusabhāvatāya sakaṭabhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ atibhārabhūtaṃ diṭṭhaṃ. Evaṃ dhammo ca hitasukhavisesehi taṃsamaṅginaṃ dhārento abhimato ca viññūhi gambhīrāppameyyabhāvena garusabhāvattā atibhārabhūto pathavīcalanassa kāraṇaṃ hotī’’ti dassento ^a^M0.0210^ea^^b^‘‘idha, mahārāja, dve sakaṭā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Ekassā^eb^ti ekasmā, ekassa vā sakaṭassa ratanaṃ, tasmā sakaṭato gahetvāti attho. ^b^Osārita^eb^nti pavesitaṃ āhaṭaṃ vuttanti attho.

[03]^b^Sabhāvapakatikā^eb^ti akittimapakatikāti attho. ^b^Kāraṇamahantattā^eb^ti mahantehi pāramitākāraṇehi buddhaguṇānaṃ nibbattitoti vuttaṃ hoti. Pathavīādayo mahantā attano attano visaye ekekāva, evaṃ sammāsambuddhopi mahanto attano visaye eko eva. Ko ca tassa visayo? Yāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ, evaṃ ākāso viya anantavisayo bhagavā eko eva hotīti vadanto lokadhātvantaresupi dutiyassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.

[03]Pubbabhāge āyūhanavasena ^b^āyūhanasamaṅgitā^eb^ sanniṭṭhānacetanāvasena ^b^cetanāsamaṅgitā^eb^ ca veditabbā, santatikhaṇavasena vā. ^b^Vipākāraha^eb^nti dutiyabhavādīsu vipaccanapakatitaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Calatī^eb^ti parivattati. Sunakhehi vajanasīlo ^b^sunakhavājiko^eb^.
[06]Paṭhamabalaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^810^eb^^b^.^eb^ Gatito ^a^V0.0212^ea^ aññā gatisampatti nāma natthīti dassento ^b^‘‘sampannā gatī’’^eb^ti āha. Mahāsudassanādisurājakālo paṭhamakappikādisumanussakālo ca ^b^kālasampatti^eb^.

[03]^b^Ekantaṃ kusalasseva okāso^eb^ti idaṃ yadipi koci kāyasucaritādipayogasampattiyaṃ ṭhitaṃ bādheyya, taṃ pana bādhanaṃ bādhakasseva issādinimittena viparītaggāhena jātaṃ. Sā payogasampatti sabhāvato sukhavipākasseva paccayo, na dukkhavipākassāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Makkaṭo bhattapuṭaṃ bandhaṭṭhāne muñcitvā bhuñjituṃ na jānāti, yattha vā tattha vā bhinditvā vināseti, evaṃ anupāyaññūpi bhoge. ^b^Susāne chaḍḍetvā^eb^tiādinā ghātetvā chaḍḍitassa vuṭṭhānābhāvo viya apāyato vuṭṭhānābhāvoti dasseti.

[03]‘‘Paccarī’’tipi ^a^M0.0211^ea^^b^uḷumpassa^eb^ nāmaṃ, tena ettha katā ‘‘mahāpaccarī’’ti vuccati. ^b^Udake maraṇaṃ thale maraṇañca ekamevā^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu sakkena ‘‘samuddārakkhaṃ karissāmī’’ti vuttanti? Saccaṃ vuttaṃ, jīvitassa lahuparivattitaṃ pakāsentehi therehi evaṃ vuttaṃ, lahuparivattitāya jīvitahetu na gamissāmāti adhippāyo. Atha vā ^b^udake^eb^ti nāgadīpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, ^b^thale^eb^ti jambudīpaṃ.

[03]^b^Thero na detī^eb^ti kathamahaṃ etena ñāto, kenaci kiñci ācikkhitaṃ siyāti saññāya na adāsi. Teneva ‘‘mayampi na jānāmā’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Aparassā^eb^ti aparassa bhikkhuno pattaṃ ādāya…pe… therassa hatthe ṭhapesīti yojanā. ^b^Anāyatane^eb^ti nikkāraṇe, ayutte vā nassanaṭṭhāne. ^b^Tuvaṃ attānaṃ rakkheyyāsi,^eb^ mayaṃ pana mahallakattā kiṃ rakkhitvā karissāma, mahallakattā eva ca rakkhituṃ na sakkhissāmāti adhippāyo. Anāgāmittā vā thero attanā vattabbaṃ jānitvā ovadati.
[03]^b^Sammāpayogassa gatamaggo^eb^ti sammāpayogena nipphāditattā tassa sañjānanakāraṇanti attho.
[03]Bhūtamatthaṃ ^a^V0.0213^ea^ katvā abhūtopamaṃ kathayissatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Manussā^eb^ti bhaṇḍāgārikādiniyuttā manussā mahantattā ^b^sampaṭicchituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu^eb^.
[06]Dutiyabalaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^811^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Añcitā^eb^ti gatā. ^b^Peccā^eb^ti puna, maritvāti vā attho. ^b^Ussannattā^eb^ti vitakkabahulatāya ussannattāti vadanti, sūratādīhi vā ^b^ussannattā. Dibbantī^eb^ti kīḷanti.

[03]Sañjīvakāḷasuttasaṅghātaroruvamahāroruvatāpanamahātāpanāvīciyo ^b^aṭṭha mahānirayā^eb^. Ekekassa cattāri dvārāni, ekekasmiṃ dvāre cattāro cattāro gūthanirayādayoti evaṃ ^b^soḷasa ussadaniraye^eb^ vaṇṇayanti.
[03]Sakkasuyāmādayo ^a^M0.0212^ea^ viya ^b^jeṭṭhakadevarājā^eb^. Pajāpativaruṇaīsānādayo viya dutiyādiṭṭhānantarakārako ^b^paricārako hutvā^eb^.
[06]Tatiyabalaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^812^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kappo^eb^ti dvedhābhūtaggo. Ettha ca bījādidhātunānattavasena khandhādidhātunānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
[06]Catutthabalaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^813^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ajjhāsayadhātū^eb^ti ^a^V0.0214^ea^ ajjhāsayasabhāvo. Yathā gūthādīnaṃ dhātusabhāvo eso, yaṃ gūthādīheva saṃsandati, evaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayassevesa sabhāvo, yaṃ dussīlādayo dussīlādikeheva saṃsandantīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Bhikkhūpi āhaṃsū^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ āhaṃsu. Āvuso ime manussā ‘‘yathāsabhāgena paribhuñjathā’’ti vadantā amhe sabhāgāsabhāge viditvā hīnajjhāsayapaṇītajjhāsayataṃ paricchinditvā dhātusaṃyuttakamme upanenti tassa payogaṃ daṭṭhukāmāti attho, evaṃ sabhāgavaseneva ajjhāsayadhātuparicchindanato ajjhāsayadhātusabhāgavasena niyametīti adhippāyo.
[06]Pañcamabalaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Carita^eb^nti idha duccaritaṃ sucaritanti vuttaṃ. Apparajaṃ akkhaṃ etesanti ^b^apparajakkhā^eb^ti attho vibhāvito, apparajaṃ akkhimhi etesanti ^b^apparajakkhā^eb^tipi saddattho sambhavati. Ettha ca āsayajānanādinā yehi ^a^M0.0213^ea^ indriyehi paroparehi sattā kalyāṇapāpāsayādikā honti, tesaṃ jānanaṃ vibhāvetīti veditabbaṃ. Evañca katvā indriyaparopariyattāasayānusayañāṇānaṃ visuṃ asādhāraṇatā, indriyaparopariyattanānādhimuttikatāñāṇānaṃ visuṃ balatā ca siddhā hoti.

[03]^b^815^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yadariyā^eb^ti ye ariyā. ^b^Āvasiṃsū^eb^ti nissāya vasiṃsu. Ke pana te? ‘‘Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti chaḷaṅgasamannāgato ekārakkho caturāpasseno panuṇṇapaccekasacco samavayasaṭṭhesano anāvilasaṅkappo passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro suvimuttacitto suvimuttapañño’’ti (dī. ni. 3.348; a. ni. 10.19) evaṃ vuttā. Etesu pañcaṅgavippahīnapaccekasaccapanodanaesanāsamavayasajjanāni ‘‘saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati adhivāseti parivajjeti vinodetī’’ti (ma. ni. 2.168) vuttesu apassenesu vinodanañca maggakiccāneva, itare ca maggeneva samijjhanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘etañhi suttaṃ…pe… dīpetī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^816^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ārammaṇasantānānusayanesu ^a^V0.0215^ea^ iṭṭhārammaṇe ārammaṇānusayanena ^b^anuseti. Āciṇṇasamāciṇṇā^eb^ti etena samantato veṭhetvā viya ṭhitabhāvena anusayitataṃ dasseti. Bhavassapi vatthukāmattā, rāgavasena vā samānattā ^b^‘‘bhavarāgānusayo…pe… saṅgahito’’^eb^ti āha.
[03]^b^818^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Paṇītādhimuttikā tikkhindriyā, itare mudindriyā’’ti evaṃ indriyavisesadassanatthameva adhimuttiggahaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘tikkhindriyamudindriyabhāvadassanattha’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^819^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pahānakkamavasenā^eb^ti ettha pahātabbapajahanakkamo pahānakkamoti daṭṭhabbo, yassa pahānena bhavitabbaṃ, taṃ teneva pahānena paṭhamaṃ vuccati, tato appahātabbanti ayaṃ vā pahānakkamo.
[03]^b^820^eb^^b^.^eb^ Maggassa upanissayabhūtāni indriyāni ^b^upanissayaindriyāni^eb^.
[03]^b^826^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nibbutichandarahitattā ^b^acchandikaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā^eb^. Yasmiṃ bhavaṅge pavattamāne taṃsantatiyaṃ lokuttaraṃ nibbattati, taṃ tassa ^b^pādakaṃ^eb^.
[06]Chaṭṭhabalaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^828^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Niddāyitvā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0214^ea^ kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karonto niddaṃ okkamitvā paṭibuddho samāpattiṃ samāpannomhīti attho. Nīvaraṇādīhi visuddhacittasantati eva ^b^cittamañjūsā,^eb^ samādhi vā, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā. ^b^Cittaṃ ṭhapetu^eb^nti samāpatticittaṃ ṭhapetuṃ. Saññāvedayitānaṃ apagamo eva ^b^apagamavimokkho^eb^.

[03]Saññāmanasikārānaṃ kāmādidutiyajjhānādipakkhandanāni ^b^‘‘hānabhāgiyavisesabhāgiyadhammā’’^eb^ti ^a^V0.0216^ea^ dassitāni, tehi pana jhānānaṃ taṃsabhāvatā dhamma-saddena vuttā. Paguṇabhāvavodānaṃ ^b^paguṇavodānaṃ^eb^. Tadeva paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyajjhānādiadhigamassa paccayattā ^b^‘‘vuṭṭhānaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Vodānampi vuṭṭhānaṃ, tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna’’nti imāya vuṭṭhānapāḷiyā asaṅgahitattā nirodhasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ ^b^‘‘pāḷimuttakavuṭṭhānaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Ye pana ‘‘nirodhato phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhāna’’nti pāḷi natthīti vadeyyuṃ, te ‘‘nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo’’ti (paṭṭhā. 1.1.417) imāya pāḷiyā paṭisedhetabbā.
[06]Sattamabalaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^831^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rāgādīhi cetaso vimuttibhūto samādhi ^b^cetovimutti^eb^. Paññāva vimutti ^b^paññāvimutti. Kammantaravipākantaramevā^eb^ti kammantarassa vipākantaramevāti attho. Cetanācetanāsampayuttakadhamme nirayādinibbānagāminipaṭipadābhūte kammanti gahetvā āha ^b^‘‘kammaparicchedamevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Appetuṃ na sakkoti^eb^ aṭṭhamanavamabalāni viya, taṃsadisaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ viya vikubbituṃ. Etena dasabalasadisatañca vāreti, jhānādiñāṇaṃ viya vā appetuṃ vikubbituñca. Yadipi hi jhānādipaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ sattamabalanti tassa savitakkasavicāratā vuttā, tathāpi jhānādīhi ^a^M0.0215^ea^ vinā paccavekkhaṇā natthīti jhānādisahagataṃ ñāṇaṃ tadantogadhaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ jhānādikiccaṃ viya na sabbaṃ balakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tañhi jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ iddhi hutvā vikubbituñca na sakkotī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, na pana kassaci balassa jhānaiddhibhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06]Dasamabalaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Ñāṇavibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^832^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Tettiṃsati ^a^M0.0216^ea^^a^V0.0217^ea^ tikā’’ti vuttaṃ, te pana ^b^pañcatiṃsa^eb^. Tathā ‘‘purisamalādayo aṭṭha navakā’’ti vuttaṃ, te pana ^b^āghātavatthuādayo nava^eb^. Ye ‘‘dve aṭṭhārasakā’’tiādimhi vuttā, te eva ‘‘iti atītāni chattiṃsā’’tiādinā tayo chattiṃsakā katāti āha ^b^‘‘cha aṭṭhārasakā’’^eb^ti, dvāsaṭṭhi pana diṭṭhigatāni aññattha vuttabhāveneva idha nikkhittānīti na gahitānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
[06]Ekakamātikādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^843-844^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atthi paṭiccaṃ nāmā^eb^ti yathā ‘‘cakkhuñca paṭiccā’’tiādīsu nissayādipaccayabhāvena paṭiccāti vuttaṃ, na tathā idha khattiyādijātīnaṃ paramatthato avijjamānānaṃ nissayādipaccayattassa abhāvā. Yesu pana khandhesu santesu khattiyādisammuti hoti, tesaṃ abbocchinnatāva khattiyādijātiyā atthitā, sā idha paṭicca-saddena vibhāvitāti attho. ^b^Ekissā seṇiyā^eb^ti asambhinnāyāti attho.

[03]Pañhavissajjanādikiriyāsu ^a^V0.0218^ea^ purato karaṇaṃ ^b^purekkhāro. Nikkheparāsī^eb^ti nidhānarāsi. ^b^Patthaṭākittino^eb^ti vitthiṇṇākittino. ^b^Rattaññumado^eb^ti purāṇaññutāmadoti vadanti. Cirarattijātena, cirarattipabbajitena vā jānitabbassa, rattīnameva vā jānanamado. ^b^Upaṭṭhāpakamāno^eb^ti āṇākaraṇamāno. Āṇākaraṇañhi vicāraṇaṃ idha ^b^‘‘yaso’’^eb^ti vuttanti. Parimaṇḍalattabhāvanissito māno ^b^pariṇāhamado^eb^. Sarīrasampattipāripūriyā mado ^b^pāripūrimado^eb^.
[03]^b^845^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vatthunā vināpi vattabbatāya ^b^avatthukaṃ,^eb^ na vatthuno abhāvā.

[03]^b^846^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cittassa vossajjana^eb^nti cittassa satito muccanaṃ, kāyaduccaritādīsu pakkhandanaṃ vā ^b^vossaggo. Patiṭṭhābhāvo^eb^ti kusalakaraṇe aṭṭhānaṃ, anuṭṭhānanti ^a^M0.0217^ea^ attho. Pamādasaṅkhātassa ^b^atthassa^eb^ kāyaduccarite cittassa vossaggo pāṇātipāte micchādiṭṭhiyaṃ kodhe upanāheti evamādiko pariyāyo apariyanto, tadatthatappariyāyappakāsako vossagganissaggādiko byañjanapariyāyo cāti sabbaṃ taṃ saṅkhipitvā evarūpoti idaṃ ākāranidassanaṃ sabbapariyāyassa vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā katanti dassento āha ^b^‘‘pariyantābhāvato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vissaṭṭhākāro^eb^ti satiyā paccanīkabhūte cattāro khandhe dasseti.
[03]^b^847^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cittassa thaddhatā^eb^ tathāpavattacittamevāti vadanti, mānaviseso vā daṭṭhabbo. Upasaṅkamane vanditabbaṃ hotīti ^b^pariyanteneva carati^eb^.

[03]^b^848^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Āpattiṃ āpannosī’’ti vutte ‘‘āvuso, tvaṃ āpannosī’’tiādinā tena vuttaṃ tasseva upari khipanavasena ^b^‘‘paṭippharitvā’’^eb^ti vadanti. ‘‘Tasmiṃ nāma dalidde, akusale vā idaṃ karonte ahaṃ kasmā na karomī’’ti evaṃ idha paṭippharaṇaṃ yuttaṃ. Karaṇassa uttarakiriyā ^b^karaṇuttariyaṃ. Akusalapakkho esā^eb^ti sārambhoti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^849^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aticca icchatīti aticciccho, tassa bhāvo aticcicchatāti vattabbe cci-kāralopaṃ katvā ^b^‘‘aticchatā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Atricchatā^eb^ti ca sā eva vuccatīti. Tatrāpi neruttikavidhānena padasiddhi veditabbā. Yathāladdhaṃ vā atikkamitvā atra atra icchanaṃ ^b^atricchatā,^eb^ sā eva ra-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā ^b^‘‘aticchatā’’^eb^ti vuttā.

[03]^b^Atriccha^eb^nti ^a^V0.0219^ea^ aticchaṃ, atra vā icchanto. Kena? ^b^Atilobhena^eb^ atilobhamicchāsaṅkhātena ^b^atilobhamadena^eb^ ca. Attano hitaṃ ^b^attā^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Hāyati^eb^ jīrati, ādiṇṇo vā ^b^attā,^eb^ patto vā ^b^attā,^eb^ naṃ jīrati candakinnariṃ patthayitvā asitābhūdeviyā vihīno viya.
[03]^b^Icchāhatassā^eb^ti icchāya upaddutassa, mudditassa vā.

[03]^b^Atihīḷayāno^eb^ti avamaññamāno. ^b^Malaka^eb^nti evaṃnāmakaṃ janapadaṃ, abbhokāsaṃ vā. ^b^Kodaṇḍakenā^eb^ti kudaṇḍakena rassadaṇḍakena. Gaddulenāti ca vadanti. ^b^Ruhiramakkhitaṅgo^eb^ti ruhirasinnagatto.
[03]^b^850^eb^^b^.^eb^ Jānantasseva ^a^M0.0218^ea^ bhiyyo bhiyyo codento viya ^b^sambhāvetukāmo hoti. Paccaye^eb^ti upādānādipaccaye.

[03]^b^851^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ye patirūpena vañcenti, te ^b^gaṇṭhikā,^eb^ durācārena vā gaṇṭhibhūtā. ^b^Gaṇṭhikaputtā nāma gaṇṭhikā eva honti, tena^eb^ saddhivihārikā gaṇṭhikabhāvena ^b^‘‘thero…pe… dīghacaṅkame viharatī’’^eb^ti vadanti.

[03]^b^Vaṭṭati bhante^eb^ti ayampi eko pakāro, lābhinā eva pana sakkā ñātunti attano samāpattilābhitaṃ sūcetīti attho. ^b^Pañcattayaṃ^eb^ nāma uparipaṇṇāsake dutiyasuttaṃ (ma. ni. 3.21 ādayo). Tassa gambhīrattā vadati ^b^‘‘pañcattayaṃ olokentassā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^852^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Siṅga^eb^nti siṅgāraṃ. Tañhi kusalassa vijjhanato samāsevitatāya sīse parikkhataṃ sunikhataṃ visāṇaṃ viya, thirattā ca siṅgaṃ viyāti siṅgaṃ, taṃ panatthato rāgo.

[03]^b^853^eb^^b^.^eb^ Temanakaraṇatthe ^b^tintiṇa^eb^-saddo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Khīyana^eb^nti ca yena lobhena paraṃ mamanti vadantaṃ khīyati, so vutto. ^b^Khīyanaṃ^eb^ bhaṇḍananti ca vadanti. ^b^Tintiṇa^eb^nti vā loluppamicceva vuttaṃ hoti. Saññā-saddo hi eso loluppavācakoti.
